title: Windows 10 / Windows 11 : comment se débarrasser du nouvel Outlook pour de bon
content: Depuis plusieurs mois maintenant, Microsoft a ouvert les vannes pour remplacer les applications Courrier et Calendrier de Windows 10 et Windows 11 par un nouvel Outlook. Cette nouvelle mouture du client de messagerie, qui reprend une interface très similaire à celle proposée par Outlook Web, est à présent installée par défaut sur Windows. Microsoft, qui espère pouvoir pousser Outlook classique vers sa tombe (et fait disparaître par la même occasion les applications Courrier et Calendrier de son OS) a d’ailleurs a multiplié les efforts pour convaincre les utilisateurs, en intégrant dans son nouveau client de messagerie, de nouvelles fonctionnalités. Malheureusement pour la firme de Redmond, le nouvel Outlook est loin de faire l’unanimité. Microsoft entend bien cependant vous forcer la main puisque, même en désinstallant l’utilitaire depuis les Paramètres > Applications > Applications installées de Windows, le nouvel Outlook fini toujours par revenir. De quoi agacer les utilisateurs qui chercheraient à s’en débarrasser pour de bon. La bonne nouvelle, c’est que l’opération est tout à fait possible. Grâce à un petit script gratuit repéré par nos confrères de XDA Developers , vous pourrez supprimer le nouvel Outlook et même l’empêcher de se réinstaller, que vous soyez sur Windows 10 ou Windows 11. « Ce script empêche l’installation de la (nouvelle) application Outlook en installant une application vierge personnalisée avec le même identifiant de...

title: 거래소, '코스피 200 다이나믹 커버드콜 지수' 21일 발표
creator: 강수윤 기자
content: [서울=뉴시스] 강수윤 기자 = 한국거래소가 오는 21일 코스피 200과 위클리옵션에 투자하는 파생전략지수인 'KRX 블룸버그 코스피 200 다이나믹 위클리 커버드콜 지수'를 발표할 예정이다. 거래소는 16일 "이번 지수는 코스피200에 투자하며 옵션 내재변동성을 활용한 지표에 따라 시장 상황을 예측해 콜옵션 매도 여부를 결정하는 커버드콜 전략을 추구하는 지수"라고 밝혔다. 블룸버그의 선진방법론을 이용해 시장 변화에 대응할 수 있는 커버드콜 전략지수를 공동 개발했다는 게 거래소 설명이다. 이 지수는 기초자산 상승 시 수익이 제한되는 기존 커버드콜 전략과 달리 시장 상황에 따라 콜옵션 매도 여부를 결정해 옵션 프리미엄 수취와 함께 코스피200 상승에 따른 이익에 참여할 수 있다. 거래소는 2019년 9월 이후 해당 지수의 누적 수익률이 33.2%로, 코스피 200 위클리 커버드콜 지수 대비 14.9% 포인트(p)의 초과 수익을 기록했다고 설명했다. 특히 주가 상승기에 높은 수익률을 보이며 장기적으로 성과가 우수한 만큼 상장지수펀드(ETF) 등의 기초지수로 활용돼 시장 상황에 대응하며 안정적인 수익을 추구하는 투자 수요를 충족할 것으로 거래소는 기대했다. 거래소 관계자는 "앞으로도 한국거래소는 새로운 컨셉과 고도화된 방법론을 적용한 선진적인 지수의 개발을 위해 적극적으로 노력할 계획"이라고 말했다. ◎공감언론 뉴시스

title: Fatih'te 1.5 yıl boyunca iş yerinden yaklaşık 7 kilo altını böyle çaldılar
content: Fatih'te 1.5 yıl boyunca iş yerinden yaklaşık 7 kilo altını böyle çaldılar Fatih’te bir kuyumcu, çalışanlarının 1 buçuk yıl boyunca iş yerinden yaklaşık 7 kilo 300 gram altın çaldığını tespit ettiği iddiasıyla Savcılığa suç duyurusunda bulundu. Hırsızlık anı kameraya yansırken, suç duyurusunun ardından açıklama yapan kuyumcu, ‘’’Çok güvendiğimden dolayı hepsine, kimseye böyle bir şey için toz konduramadım. Ben paramın gelmesini, bunların ceza almasını ve yargılanmasını istiyorum’’ dedi.

title: 검찰 '수사정보 누설' 금품 수수한 경찰관 징역 4년 구형
creator: 김정화 기자
content: [대구=뉴시스] 김정화 기자 = 형사사건 브로커에게 수회에 걸쳐 신병 관련 수사 정보를 누설하고 수사 편의 등을 제공하고 금품·향응을 수수한 혐의로 팀장급 경찰관에게 징역 4년이 구형됐다. 대구지법 형사11부(부장판사 이종길)는 16일 부정처사후수뢰 등 혐의로 기소된 전(前) 대구시경찰청 수사팀장 A(55)씨의 결심 공판을 진행했다. 검찰은 "조직범죄를 전담하고 관련 수사를 진행하는 사람으로서 피고인의 지위는 상당히 심각하고 중요한 부분임에도 브로커로부터 수차례에 걸쳐 향응, 금품을 받았다"며 징역 4년, 추징금 741만여원, 벌금 2000만원을 구형했다. A씨의 변호인은 "어릴 적부터 알고 지내던 동네 후배에 대한 경계심을 지키지 못해 결국 가족들에게 큰 아픔을 남기게 됐다"며 "구속영장이 기각된 후 적극적으로 수사에 협조하면서 자백했다. 공소사실을 모두 인정하며 반성하고 있는 점 등을 참작해 단 한 번 선처해 주시길 간절히 희망한다"고 최후 변론했다. 최후 진술에서 A씨는 "이 자리에 선 제 자신이 부끄럽고 죄스럽다"며 "32년을 강력계 형사로 있었다. 40년 전에 알던 동네 후배가 부탁하는 것을 선 긋고 지키지 못한 점이 있었다. 어리석음으로 인해 큰 죄를 저질렀다. 다시 한번 기회를 주시면 사회에 봉사하며 열심히 살도록 하겠다. 죄송하다"고 했다. A씨는 2023년 7월부터 8월까지 형사사건 브로커에게 불법 도박사이트 운영 총책에 대한 체포영장 발부 사실 및 집행 계획 등 수사 상황을 알려준 혐의로 재판에...

title: ‘Admission of malnourished children rises to 24% in N/East’
content: By Idowu Isamotu The International Committee of the Red Cross (ICRC) has expressed concerns over the increasing rate of malnourished children’s admission in some health facilities in the North East region of the country due to conflict and climate change. The organisation noted that in North East Nigeria, admissions of severely malnourished children have increased by 24% between the third quarters of 2023 and 2024, adding that this was caused by a 4-year high in food insecurity caused by conflict and climate change. The Public Relations Officer of the organisation in Nigeria, Aliyu Dawobe, in a statement issued in Abuja, said the increase was part of a trend affecting the entire Lake Chad Basin region. Dawobe said in the region, an estimated 6.1 million people would not have enough to eat in the coming months due to both conflict and climate, the highest figure in four years. NIGERIA DAILY: How Nigerian Farmers Stay Productive In Dry Season Bashar traditional title: Rekna’s suspension by Plateau government raises questions “The rise in the number of people without enough food mirrors an increase in violence, which has severely impacted communities’ ability to grow crops and access markets. “Violent incidents in the Lake Chad region in the first half of 2024 rose 58% compared with the same period in 2023. “Climate hazards are also preventing people from growing crops and accessing their farmland and markets, contributing to a food security crisis being felt across Lake Chad –...

title: هفتمین سفر منطقه‌ای عراقچی؛ وزیر خارجه عازم اردن شد
creator: info@entekhab.ir
content: باشگاه خبرنگاران:عباس عراقچی وزیر امور خارجه صبح امروز در صدر هیئتی عازم اردن شد. محور اصلی مذاکرات وزیر امورخارجه با مقامات ارشد اردن بررسی تحولات منطقه و رایزنی برای توقف جنایات و تجاوزات رژیم صهیونی اعلام شده است. این هفتمین سفر وزیر امورخارجه به پایتخت کشور‌های منطقه با هدف رایزنی برای توقف جنایات رژیم صهیونیستی است. عراقچی پیش از این به لبنان، سوریه، عربستان سعودی، قطر و عمان سفر و با مقام‌های بلندپایه این کشور‌ها دیدار و گفتگو کرده بود. محور رایزنی عراقچی در این سفر‌های منطقه‌ای، توقف جنایات رژیم صهیونیستی علیه مردم لبنان و غزه و همچنین کمک به آوارگان لبنانی بوده است. طبق گزارش‌های رسانه‌ای، وزیر خارجه ایران به‌زودی به مصر نیز سفر خواهد کرد.

title: Canda Jokowi soal Pulang ke Solo Naik Pesawat Komersial: Belum Beli Tiket
content: Canda Jokowi soal Pulang ke Solo Naik Pesawat Komersial: Belum Beli Tiket Eva Safitri - detikNews Rabu, 16 Okt 2024 12:03 WIB Jokowi di Asahan, Sumatera Utara. (Foto: dok. istimewa) Jakarta - Presiden Joko Widodo ( Jokowi ) menyebut akan pulang ke Solo seusai pelantikan, yakni pada 20 Oktober sore. Beredar kabar Jokowi akan pulang ke Solo menggunakan pesawat komersial. Apakah benar? Hal ini sempat ditanyakan ke Jokowi di sela kunjungan kerja di Asahan, Sumatera Utara, Rabu (16/10/2024). Jokowi menjawab tidak tahu dan sambil berkelakar belum membeli tiket. "Nggak tahu. Belum beli tiket, ha-ha-ha...," ujarnya. ADVERTISEMENT SCROLL TO CONTINUE WITH CONTENT Baca juga: Jokowi Langsung ke Solo Pakai Pesawat Komersial Setelah Prabowo Dilantik Sebelumnya, dilansir detikFinance , Menteri Komunikasi dan Informatika (Menkominfo) Budi Arie Setiadi mengungkapkan Presiden Joko Widodo (Jokowi) akan langsung pulang ke Solo setelah Prabowo Subianto dilantik. Jokowi akan terbang menggunakan pesawat Citilink pada 20 Oktober mendatang. "Citilink ya," kata Menteri Komunikasi dan Informatika Budi Arie Setiadi, Senin (14/10/2024) dikutip dari detikFinance . ADVERTISEMENT Bocoran dari Budi Arie, rencananya Jokowi naik pesawat komersial dari Halim ke Bandara Adi Soemarmo, Solo, pada pukul 15.00 WIB. "Naik pesawat dari Halim jam 15.00 WIB tanggal 20 Oktober 2024," ungkap Budi Arie. title: 세종시 '복합커뮤니티센터→행복누림터' 명칭 변경
creator: 송승화 기자
content: [세종=뉴시스]송승화 기자 = 한글문화도시를 지향하는 세종시가 외래어 명칭 시설인 ‘복합커뮤니티센터’의 명칭을 ‘행복누림터’로 변경한다. 16일 시에 따르면 시청 전 부서와 산하기관을 대상으로 제578돌 한글날 경축식에서 발표한 관내 외래어 시설 명칭들의 우리말 개선계획을 안내했다. 김하균 행정부시장은 지난 9일 열린 경축식에서 ▲복합커뮤니티센터, 로컬푸드가공지원센터 ▲도도리파크 ▲직장맘지원센터 ▲여성플라자 ▲세종형 쉐어하우스 ▲전의게스트하우스 ▲세종묘목플랫폼 등 8개 명칭을 다듬은 우리말 개선계획을 발표했다. 복합커뮤니티센터의 새 이름인 ‘행복누림터’는 한글학회(회장 김주원), 한글문화연대(대표 이건범), 세종시 한글사랑위원회(위원장 김슬옹) 등의 추천과 시민들의 의견을 반영해 탄생했다. 행복누림터는 ‘행정과 복지를 누리는 장소’라는 의미 외에도 있는 그대로 ‘행복을 누리는 장소’라는 의미로 해석이 가능해 간결하면서도 폭넓게 사용될 수 있는 명칭으로 평가됐다. 로컬푸드가공지원센터는 ‘우리농산물가공지원센터’, 도도리파크는 ‘도도리공원’, 직장맘지원센터는 ‘직장여성지원센터’로 변경된다. 또 여성플라자는 ‘여성활동지원본부’, 세종형 쉐어하우스는 ‘세종형 공유주택’, 전의게스트하우스는 ‘전의여행자숙소’, 세종묘목플랫폼은 ‘세종묘목마당’이라는 새 이름을 갖게 됐다. 각 시설의 새 이름은 관내 시설 명칭에 대한 전수조사, 한글사랑위원회 회의, 시민 대상 설문조사, 시설별...

title: Politički potres u Rumunjskoj, kontroverznoj političarki zabranili kandidaturu: ‘Ona predstavlja zlo...‘
content: Rumunjski ustavni sud (CCR) optužen je za nedemokratsko miješanje u predsjedničke izbore nakon što je zabranio proruskoj, anti-EU, krajnje desničarskoj kandidatkinji da se kandidira na predsjedničkim izborima u dva kruga, 24. studenoga i 8. prosinca. Sud je presudio da njezine javne izjave i ponašanje "sistematski" krše ustavni temelj zemlje i njezino članstvo u EU i NATO-u, prenosi . Sosoaca, šefica ultranacionalističke stranke S.O.S Rumunjska, koja je u lipnju izabrana u Europski parlament, prva je kandidatkinja koju je sud izbacio iz predsjedničke utrke na temelju njezinih javnih izjava, rekla je , profesorica Fakulteta političkih znanosti na Sveučilištu u Bukureštu. "To je zbunjujuće jer smo i ranije imali kandidate koji nisu nužno bili u skladu s demokratskim vrijednostima... Ali ovo pitanje nikada do sada nije bilo pokrenuto. Ovo je prvi put da sud gleda vrijednosti i načela ustava te vidi slažu li se ona s kandidatom", izjavila je Iancu za Politico. Maximilian Krah i Diana Iovanovici Sosoaca Inače, presuda ustavnog suda izazvala je kritike Sosoacainih suparnika iz cijelog političkog spektra, uključujući i socijaliste, liberale i akademike. Jedna je osoba ukazala na to kako ona odražava izbornu vlast Kremlja, prenosi Smatraju odluku politički motiviranom te joj je cilj olakšati put predsjedničkom kandidatu vladajuće Socijaldemokratske stranke, sadašnjem premijeru Marcelu Ciolacu. Ova je odluka također izazvala bijesni, antisemitski odgovor...

title: '2. emekli maaşı gelecek' EYT'lileri de ilgilendiriyor! Yeni sistem...
content: Gündemin en çok konuşulan konuları arasında asgari ücretin yanı sıra emekli maaşı zammı ve yeni emeklilik sistemi konusu var. Emekliye yeni sistemle ilgili paket meclise geldiğinde netlik kazanacak ancak o sistemin detayları şimdiden konuşulmaya başlandı. Ekonomi gazetecisi Faruk Erdem, 'çalışan emekliye ikinci bir emekli maaşı' konusunu da içeren o maddeleri paylaştı. İşte detaylar... MAAŞ HESAPLAMA YÖNTEMİ Emeklilikte yeni sistem konuşulmaya başlandı. A Para canlı yayınında Faruk Erdem bu sisteme ilişkin değerlendirmeler yaptı. Erdem konuşmasında şu ifadeleri kullandı: "Zaten bunların bir kısmı önceden konuştuğumuz konulardı. Bir kısmı zaten orta vadeli programda yer aldı. Dolayısıyla bunlarla ilgili yasal altyapının da hazırlanması bu yasama döneminde olacak diye bekliyoruz. Maaş hesaplama yöntemi değişiyor maddesinden başlayalım. Bunu daha önce de konuştuk. Burada üçlü bir yapı var; 2000 öncesi ayrı hesaplanıyor, 2000 ile 2008 ayrı, 2008 sonrası ayrı, farklı aylık bağlama oranları var, farklı güncelleme rakamları var. Yine üç ayrı kanuna göre hesaplama yapılıyor. Karmaşık bir sistem. Bunun sadeleşmesi gündemde. Burada bu güncelleme katsayıları sebebiyle de yıllar arasında çeşitli sorunlar ortaya çıkıyor ki 2024 ile 2025 arasında çok bariz bir güncelleme katsayısı farkı ortaya çıktı. Bununla ilgili de bir çalışma başlatıldığını Çalışma Bakanı Vedat Işıkhan açıklamıştı yine AK Parti Grup Başkan Vekili...

title: 한강 작가, 독도에 노벨상 상금 13억 기부?...서경덕 "가짜뉴스"
creator: 김예랑
content: 한강 작가가 노벨상 포상금을 독도에 기부하겠다는 가짜뉴스가 확산하고 있다. 서경덕 성신여대 교수는 16일 "이틀 동안 정말 많은 DM(다이렉트 메시지)을 받았다"며 "올해 노벨 문학상을 받은 한강 작가가 포상금 전액을 독도에 기부한다는 내용이었다"고 설명했다. 이어 "몇몇 누리꾼이 '교수님이 기부받으시냐'고 물어보시는 데 전혀 아니다"라며 "이건 누군가가 꾸며낸 가짜뉴스"라고 밝혔다. 서 교수는 "독도에 관한 소식이니 제게 연락을 많이 주시는 건 괜찮은데 황당한 가짜뉴스에 절대 속지 마시길 바란다"고 당부했다. 지난 파리 올림픽 당시에도 양궁에서 3관왕을 차지한 김우진 선수가 독도 알리기에 5억원을 기부한다는 소식이 온라인상에 퍼진 바 있다. 이 또한 가짜뉴스로 판명됐다. 서 교수는 "솔직히 좀 당혹스럽다"며 "사회적으로 큰 문제를 야기하고 있는 가짜뉴스를 만들어 퍼트리는 누리꾼은 강력히 처벌해야 한다"고 강조했다. 그러면서 "본보기가 만들어지지 않는다면 이런 가짜뉴스는 계속해서 소셜미디어에서 판을 칠 게 뻔하기 때문"이라고 덧붙였다. 한국 작가 최초로 노벨 문학상을 받은 소설가 한강은 상금 100만 크로나(약 13억 4000만원)을 받게 된다. 소득세법 시행령 18조는 비과세되는 기타소득으로 '노벨상 또는 외국 정부·국제기관·국제단체 기타 외국의 단체나 기금으로부터 받는 상의 수상자가 받는 상금과 부상'을 명시하고 있어 한강이 13억여원을 고스란히 받을 것으로 보인다. 김예랑 한경닷컴 기자...

title: Montana Republican Gov. Greg Gianforte to debate Democratic rival
creator: By MEAD GRUVER - Associated Press
content: Montana's Republican governor on Wednesday will face his Democratic challenger in likely their only debate this election season in a state tilting toward the GOP. Gov. Greg Gianforte at first dismissed Ryan Busse, a former firearms industry executive, as not a “serious candidate” and refused to debate the Democrat because he hadn't released his tax returns. Busse responded by releasing 10 years of income tax records , setting the stage for the debate hosted by ABC Fox Montana. Gianforte's election by a wide margin in 2020 — with backing from former President Donald Trump — ended a 16-year run of Democratic governors in Montana. The wealthy former technology executive spent more than $7.5 million of his own money in the 2020 race, and has since overseen a decrease in individual income taxes and an increase in residential property taxes in Montana. The state balanced its budget and had record-low unemployment under Gianforte. He signed laws blocking gender-affirming medical care for transgender minors and limiting access to abortion, but those have been blocked by courts. A Republican supermajority in the Legislature gave him power to directly appoint judges and justices when mid-term vacancies occur and also funded charter schools, a longtime Gianforte goal. Busse, who is from Kalispell, has sought to portray Gianforte as wealthy and out of touch with ordinary citizens. He has accused Gianforte of using his personal wealth to reach office and then standing by as housing costs...

title: 아리셀 모회사 에스코넥 관계자 구속 심사 당일 숨진 채 발견
creator: 김태희 기자 kth08@kyunghyang.com
content: 경기 화성 일차전지 업체 아리셀의 모회사인 에스코넥 관계자가 구속 심사 당일인 16일 숨진 채 발견됐다. 경기 화성서부경찰서에 따르면 이날 오전 11시쯤 화성시 장안면 단독주택에서 아리셀 모회사인 에스코넥 관리자급 직원 A씨가 숨진 채 발견됐다. A씨는 아리셀과 에스코넥이 국방부의 품질검사를 조작해 불량 배터리를 납품한 의혹과 관련해 경찰의 수사를 받아왔다. 경찰은 화재 사건을 수사하던 중 아리셀이 2021년 군납을 시작할 당시부터 줄곧 품질검사를 조작해 47억원 상당을 납품한 사실을 확인해 추가 수사를 벌여왔다. 아리셀의 모회사인 에스코넥 역시 2017∼2018년 국방부에 전지를 납품할 당시 시험데이터를 조작하는 수법으로 군의 품질검사를 통과한 것으로 파악됐다. 경찰은 아리셀과 에스코넥의 전현직 임직원 24명을 형사 입건해 조사해왔다. 피의자 중 혐의가 중한 A씨 등 3명에 대해 지난 10일 업무방해 혐의로 사전 구속영장을 신청했다. 경찰은 이날 오전 10시30분 수원지법에서 예정된 구속 전 피의자 심문(영장실질심사) 참석에 앞서 법원에서 이들 3명을 만날 예정이었다. 그러나 A씨가 약속 장소인 법원에 나오지 않았다. 경찰은 소재 확인에 나선 끝에 자택에서 숨진 A씨를 발견했다.

title: Ivani Knoll događa se ono što nikako nije željela; samo jedan pogled i svima je jasno o čemu se radi
content: Njena je popularnoj munjevito narasla tijekom Svjetskog prvenstva u Kataru. Ivana Knoll je iz kola u kolo, bodreći Vatrene u raznim modnim kombinacijama, skupljala nove obožavatelje, a brojčanik je na njezinome Instagramu ludovao. Pisali su o njoj i brojni svjetski mediji, posebno su se raspisali Englezi, a većina ju je proglasila najpoznatijom svjetskom navijačicom. No, slava takve vrste kako dođe, tako i prođe. Još će sigurno neko vrijeme Ivana Knoll ili umjetničkog imena Knoll Dol brati plodove tog zvjezdanog uspona, ali jasno je sada da je njezin zenit prošao. Otkriva to pogled na brojke, one iste koje su ludovale, na njezinom Instagramu. Broj obožavatelja je nakon dugo vremena pao ispod tri milijuna. Nije to loše, naprotiv. Skupiti toliko obožavatelja pravi je podvig. No, Ivana je imala i više od 3,6 milijuna, činilo se da je nebo granica, no mnogi su počeli odustajati od praćenja ipak sve manje popularne Ivane. Iskoristila je ona ‘boom‘ da se okuša i kao DJ pa je pritiskala dugmad na splitskoj Ultri, dok je i lansirala svoju liniju kupaćih kostima. Živi na visokoj nozi, no došlo je do ‘zasićenja tržišta‘, što se vidi i na brojkama. Nije je bilo ni u Poljskoj, odmakla se od reprezentacije, osim na velikoj sceni. Možda je i to greška.

title: 송지은, ♥박위와 과감 스킨십...볼에 입맞춤까지
creator: 신효령 기자
content: [서울=뉴시스] 신효령 기자 = 그룹 '시크릿' 출신 송지은(34)이 남편인 유튜버 박위(36)와 신혼 일상을 공개했다. 송지은은 16일 본인 소셜미디어에 "지나가다 베리어프리 네컷사진이 있어서 한번 찍어보았는데요"라고 적고 사진을 올렸다. 사진 속 송지은은 박위와 다정한 포즈를 취하며 네컷 사진을 찍었다. 송지은은 박위의 볼에 입맞춤을 하는 등 과감한 스킨십을 펼치며 신혼 부부의 달달함을 드러냈다. 송지은과 박위는 지난 9일 서울 강남 모처에서 백년가약을 맺었다. 지난해 12월 열애를 알린 지 1년여 만이다. 결혼식 이틀 전인 7일 혼인신고를 마쳤다. 결혼식 사회는 아나운서 출신 방송인 전현무가 맡았고, 축가는 가수 인순이와 조혜련이 불렀다. 한편 송지은은 지난해 12월 자신의 소셜미디어에 "제 삶에 선물과도 같이 찾아온 소중한 사람을 여러분께 소개한다"며 박위와 열애 중이라고 공개했다. 송지은은 2009년 시크릿으로 데뷔했다. 멤버들과 '매직', '마돈나' 등의 히트곡을 냈다. 배우로도 활동 영역을 넓혔다. 박위는 구독자 약 90만명을 보유한 유튜버로, 2014년 낙상 사고로 전신마비 판정을 받았다. 재활 끝에 전신마비를 이겨냈으며, 휠체어를 타고 생활 중이다. 드라마 '학교2'(1999~2000) '기적의 형제'(2023) '아름다운 세상'(2019) 등을 연출한 박찬홍 PD가 그의 부친이다. ◎공감언론 뉴시스

title: Yogi meets Bahraich violence victim’s kin
creator: The Hans India
content: Lucknow/Bahraich: Uttar Pradesh Chief Minister Yogi Adityanath on Tuesday termed the 22-year-old man’s death in the Bahraich communal violence “unfortunate” and said the culprits of this unforgivable incident will not be spared. Adityanath met with the family members of Ram Gopal Mishra in Lucknow. BJP MLA from Mahsi Sureshwar Singh accompanied the family during the visit. In a post on X in Hindi, the chief minister said, “Today in Lucknow, I met with the grief-stricken family members of the youth who died in the unfortunate incident in Bahraich district. In this hour of grief, the Uttar Pradesh government stands with the victim’s family with full sensitivity and commitment.” “Rest assured, providing justice to the victim’s family is the top priority of @UPGovt. The culprits of this extremely reprehensible and unforgivable incident will not be spared at any cost,” he added. Mishra was shot dead and about half a dozen people were injured in stone pelting and firing as communal violence broke out in the Maharajganj area of Bahraich near Rehua Mansoor village in Mahsi tehsil during a Durga idol immersion procession in Bahraich on Sunday. His last rites were performed amid heavy security on Monday. The Uttar Pradesh government shared a video of the chief minister’s meeting with Ram Gopal Mishra’s wife Roli Mishra, his father Kailash Nath Mishra, mother Munni Devi and cousin Kishan Mishra. In the video clip, Kailash Nath Mishra could be seen asking his wife to control her...

title: '국화 한가득' 분재 55점·조형물 50점...전시회, 25일 개막
creator: 김덕진 기자
content: [당진=뉴시스]김덕진 기자 = 제15회 당진국화전시회가 25일부터 11월3일까지 합덕농촌테마공원에서 열린다. 충남 당진시는 가을꽃인 국화를 주제로 시민들에게 다양한 볼거리 제공과 지역관광 활성화를 위해 이번 전시회를 갖는다고 16일 밝혔다. 국화연구회원들이 직접 키운 분재작품 55점과 김대건 신부, 서해복선전철 등 당진을 상징하는 국화조형물 50점이 전시될 예정이다. 주말에는 당진에서 생산된 맛 좋고 신선한 농산물을 살 수 있는 농산물판매장이 운영된다. 짚풀공예와 도자기공예, 연잎밥 만들기, 합떡만들기 등의 체험활동도 이뤄진다. 내달 1~2일에는 야외 체험마당에서 합덕역 개통기념 화합한마당 행사도 예고됐다. 시 관계자는 "화창한 가을날 사랑하는 가족·친구와 함께 가을꽃 국화를 만끽하길 바란다"며 "주변 신리성지, 삽교호관광지, 면천읍성 등의 당진 대표 관광지를 둘러보며 지친 일상에서 재충전할 수 있는 시간을 가졌으면 좋겠다"고 말했다. 당진국화전시회는 매년 열린다. 이번 전시회 관람 시간은 오전 10시부터 오후 5시까지다. ◎공감언론 뉴시스

title: China turns sour on popular ‘wax bottle candy’ as food safety concerns bite
content: BEIJING: China is cracking down on “wax bottle candy”, a popular snack among children that is also sold abroad, over food safety concerns. Known for their chewy texture and colourful appearance, the candies – known colloquially as “la ping tang” – are made from beeswax and contain syrup. They’ve seen a recent surge in popularity, driven by influencers showcasing the snack. But a lack of proper labels such as production dates, quality certificates and manufacturer details has been ringing alarm bells among food safety authorities. At least six Chinese provinces, including Gansu, Hubei and Sichuan, are cracking down on the popular treat, according to local news outlets, conducting spot checks on businesses and confiscating non-compliant products. Reports did not indicate when such measures began. In Yuzhong county in Gansu province, officials inspected 68 businesses around schools over the weekend. More than half were ordered to remove the candies from their shelves and close to 100 boxes of the treats were confiscated, local news site China Daily reported. Other cities have issued health warnings to consumers, stating that while the beeswax used in making the candies is not toxic, some manufacturers have been found to use inferior or industrial wax which poses potential health risks. The sweet treats are meant to be chewed to release and savour the syrup within, rather than swallowed whole. The Chinese-made snacks have also been raising eyebrows in other places. Food...

title: Участники СВО поблагодарили за помощь приходы храмов Орловской области
content: Приходы орловских храмов продолжают оказывать гуманитарную поддержку участникам СВО. Об этом сообщают в информационно-аналитическом отделе региональной митрополии. Гуманитарные грузы отправляют в разные подразделения. Например, приходская община Свято-Троицкого храма Орла собрала очередную посылку для зенитчиков. Бойцам передали маскировочные сети, средства связи и высокотехнологичные оптические приборы. Приход храма иконы Божией Матери «Знамение» Курская-Коренная собрал средства для приобретения высокотехнологичного летательного аппарата. Он нужен для ведения воздушных разведывательных операций. Приход Успенского собора Орла помог приобрести дорогостоящий усилитель сигнала квадрокоптера. Такое устройство позволяет бойцам разведгруппы управлять летательными аппаратами из укрытий. В ответ бойцы прислали видеообращения со словами благодарности. Их разместили на сайте митрополии.

title: Глава МИД Венгрии прокомментировал создание группы «Друзей мира»
content: Новая платформа по урегулированию ситуации на Украине «Друзья мира» создана для того, чтобы показать, что мировое большинство выступает за окончание конфликта, заявил глава МИД Венгрии Петер Сийярто. В интервью РИА Новости он отметил, что созданная КНР, Бразилией и государствами глобального Юга группа будет большой, сильной и заставит голос мира быть услышанным. Ранее «МК» писал , что, по мнению главы венгерского МИД, победа кандидата от Республиканской парти Дональда Трампа на президентских выборах США станет лучшим вариантом для Венгрии. tml

title: 청주시, 재난안전 업무 강화...영상 공유서비스 시범도입
creator: 임선우 기자
content: [청주=뉴시스] 임선우 기자 = 충북 청주시가 재난안전 업무를 강화한다. 지난 7월 재난안전실을 신설한 데 이어 시민 생명과 재산을 지키기 위한 각종 정책을 펼친다. 16일 시에 따르면 '실시간 재난현장 영상 공유 서비스'가 이달 중 시범적으로 도입된다. 재난 현장에 출동한 직원이나 주변 시민이 촬영한 영상을 재난상황실과 관련 부서에 실시간으로 전달함으로써 정확한 상황 판단과 신속한 대응을 돕는다. 기존의 재난안전통신망이나 휴대전화, 사회관계망서비스(SNS) 등은 동시다발적인 상황 전파에 한계를 지녀왔다. 시는 재난대응과 시범 운영을 거쳐 내년부터 4개 구청 건설과와 당직실로 확대 운영할 계획이다. 안전취약계층 지원 관련 조례도 손을 본다. 내년 상반기 안으로 ▲안전취약계층 지원 조례 ▲안전취약계층 이용건물의 화재예방 안전시설 지원 조례 ▲화재대피용 방연마스크 비치 및 지원에 관한 조례를 일원화한다. 상습침수지역 8곳에서는 재해예방사업을 벌인다. 강내면 석화2지구와 사천동 발산지구·분평동 미평천지구에서 풍수해생활권 종합정비사업을, 미원면 운암2길과 남이면 외천지구·옥산면 가락지구·내수읍 비중지구·내수읍 지산지구에서 자연재해위험 개선사업을 각각 추진한다. 총사업비는 2217억원이다. 도심 내 세월교에는 하천수위 감지 센서를 통한 자동차단시스템을 순차적으로 도입할 예정이다. 시 관계자는 "안전한 청주를 만드는 데 모든 행정역량을 모으겠다"고 말했다....

title: Misstrauen in die Politik: Darum verlieren viele B+rger das Vertrauen
creator: Florian Harms
content: Guten Morgen, liebe Leserin, lieber Leser, draußen wird's kälter und dunkler, umso wichtiger, ein bisschen Licht ins Leben zu lassen. Die Politik mag gegenwärtig unerquicklich sein, doch ist es nicht so, dass es nirgends voranginge. Es ist eine Frage der Perspektive, ob man das Glas halbvoll oder halbleer sieht, und manchmal erscheinen Auswege gar nicht so schwierig zu finden. "Die Probleme lassen sich lösen", überschrieb ich vor drei Wochen einen Tagesanbruch und versuchte, Lösungsvorschläge für einige drängende Herausforderungen in Deutschland zu skizzieren. Die Ausgabe provozierte zahlreiche Zuschriften, erfreulich viele Leser teilten die konstruktive Weltsicht. Andere Leser hingegen äußerten Kritik – und eine dieser Äußerungen machte mich hellhörig, weil sie nicht barsch, sondern differenziert daherkam und versuchte, einem grundlegenden Problem auf den Grund zu gehen: Warum fällt es uns allen so schwer, große Herausforderungen wie die Klimakrise, die Wiederherstellung der Verteidigungsfähigkeit oder die Digitalisierung von Verwaltung und Schulen entschlossen anzupacken? Warum plant und handelt die Politik oft kurz- statt langfristig, und warum wenden sich viele Menschen von den etablierten Parteien ab? Was der Leser schrieb, machte mich neugierig, also bat ich ihn um ein Interview. Er möchte anonym bleiben, aber so viel kann ich Ihnen sagen: Er hat 20 Jahre lang als selbständiger Krisenmanager in Dax-Konzernen gearbeitet und sich intensiv mit...

title: California health care workers get a pay bump under a new minimum wage law
creator: By SOPHIE AUSTIN - Associated Press/Report for America

title: California health care workers get a pay bump under a new minimum wage law
creator: By SOPHIE AUSTIN - Associated Press/Report for America
content: SACRAMENTO, Calif. (AP) — Some of the lowest-paid health care workers in California will get a pay bump Wednesday under a state law gradually increasing their wages to at least $25 an hour. Workers at rural, independent health care facilities will start making a minimum of $18 an hour, while others at hospitals with at least 10,000 full-time employees will begin getting paid at least $23 an hour this week. The law will increase workers' pay over the next decade, with the $25 hourly rate kicking in sooner for some than others. About 350,000 workers will have to be paid more under the law starting Wednesday, according to the University of California, Berkeley Labor Center. Democratic Gov. Gavin Newsom signed the law last year, and workers were slated to get raises in June. Lawmakers and the governor agreed this year to delay the law to help close an estimated $46.8 billion budget shortfall. Carmela Coyle, president and CEO of the California Hospital Association, said last year that the legislation will support workers and protect access to health care services. "SB 525 strikes the right balance between significantly improving wages while protecting jobs and safeguarding care at community hospitals throughout the state,” she said in a statement. California's minimum wage for most workers in the state is $16 an hour. Voters will decide in November whether to increase the rate gradually to $18 an hour by 2026, which would be the highest statewide minimum wage in the U.S. Fast...

title: Bosch, la banda presidencial y un viaje a México
creator: MIGUEL GUERRERO
content: Muchos dominicanos ignoran que el profesor Juan Bosch nunca usó en el territorio nacional la banda presidencial que sus sucesores, sin excepción, exhibieron y exhiben profusamente. Sólo se la ciñó una vez y en contra de su voluntad durante su viaje a México, a comienzos de septiembre, dos semanas antes de su derrocamiento. Fue en ocasión de la celebración del aniversario del Grito de Dolores, que marcó el inicio de la lucha por la independencia mexicana y que ese país celebra como fecha nacional. El programa de ese día indicaba que Bosch debía aparecer con su anfitrión, el presidente Adolfo López Mateos, en uno de los balcones del palacio en la plaza del Zócalo. Bosch se negó en principio a ponerse la banda, que por lo demás no tenía, pero se vio obligado a ceder cuando se le exigió usarla conforme lo disponía el protocolo, para lo que fue necesario mandarle a confeccionar una banda que nadie ha podido decir después qué fue de ella. Bosch, que no daba su brazo a torcer, desairó a sus anfitriones al rechazar en cambio la condecoración del Águila Azteca con la que sería honrado. El creía que a los dominicanos de aquella época no les agradaba que sus líderes aceptaran este tipo de homenaje porque recordaban a Trujillo, que era un ególatra y fanático perverso de las condecoraciones y de los homenajes, que sus áulicos inventaban bajo cualquier pretexto. Bosch fue hasta el último día de su vida intransigente en este tipo de cosas y sus seguidores,...

title: 강화군수 보궐선거, 오후 2시 누적 투표율 49.4%
creator: 김동영 기자
content: [인천=뉴시스] 김동영 기자 = 인천 강화군수 보궐선거 본투표가 시작된 16일, 사전투표를 포함한 전체 투표율은 49.4%를 기록하고 있다. 인천시선거관리위원회에 따르면 이날 오후 2시 기준 강화지역 유권자 6만2731명 가운데 총 3만1009명(49.4%)이 소중한 한 표를 행사했다. 앞서 지난 11일부터 12일까지 열린 사전투표에서는 유권자 1만7502명(27.90%)이 투표를 마쳤다. 이번 보궐선거의 투표율은 지난 2022년 8회 지방선거 낮은 것으로 나타났다. 당시 강화군민은 3만4708명이 투표에 참여, 55.0% 투표율을 보였다. 사전투표의 경우 1만9314명이 투표를 완료하면서 30.59%의 투표율을 기록했다. 강화군수 보궐선거는 지난 3월 유천호 전 군수가 지병으로 별세하면서 치러지게 됐다. 국민의힘에서는 박용철(59) 후보가, 더불어민주당에선 한연희(65) 후보가 출사표를 던졌다. 안상수(78)·김병연(52) 후보는 무소속으로 출마했다. 한편 강화군수 보궐선거는 이날 오후 8시까지 강화군 내 40곳 투표소에서 실시된다. 투표하러 갈 때는 본인의 주민등록증, 여권, 운전면허증 등 관공서 또는 공공기관이 발행하고 생년월일과 사진이 첨부돼 본인임을 확인할 수 있는 신분증을 가지고 가야 한다. 선거일에는 누구든지 선거운동을 할 수 없고 ▲기표소 안에서 투표지를 촬영하는 행위 ▲투표(용)지를 훼손하는 행위 ▲투표소 100m 안에서 투표참여를 권유하는 행위는 금지된다. 다만 선거운동을 할 수 있는 사람이 인터넷·전자우편(SNS 포함)·문자메시지를 이용해...

title: Гороскоп на 16 октября для жителей Костромской области
content: Овен Сегодня звезды советуют Овнам обратить внимание на дом и близких. Возможен неожиданный визит старых друзей или родственников, что принесет массу положительных эмоций. title: World News | Zelenskyy to Unveil 'victory Plan' to Ukrainian Lawmakers After Presenting It to Western Allies
content: Kyiv, Oct 16 (AP) Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy was set to at least partially unveil a plan to win the war against Russia to his country's Parliament on Wednesday after weeks of dropping hints about the blueprint to lukewarm Western allies, including U.S. President Joe Biden. The plan — comprising military, political, diplomatic and economic elements — is considered by many as Ukraine's last resort to strengthen its hand in any future cease-fire negotiations with Russia. Thus far, however, no country has publicly endorsed it or commented on its feasibility. Also Read | Islamabad Disappointed To See Real Democracy in Jammu and Kashmir, Says India (Watch Video). Zelenskyy is keen to get the “victory plan” in place before a new U.S. president is sworn in next year, though Ukrainian officials say neither presidential candidate will necessarily improve Kyiv's standing in the war. Zelenskyy's presentation to Parliament, announced on Monday by presidential adviser Serhii Leshchenko, comes during a bleak moment in Ukraine. The country's military is suffering losses along the eastern front as Russian forces inch closer to a strategically significant victory near the crucial logistics hub of Pokrovsk. Also Read | India-Canada Diplomatic Row: Representatives of Gurdwara in British Columbia Urge Shutting Down of Indian Consulates in Vancouver and Toronto. At every turn, Kyiv is outnumbered by Moscow: The country is struggling to replenish ranks with an unpopular mobilization...

title: Sotaväsymys yltyy: Upin Jussi Lassila arvioi, onko Venäjällä tapahtumassa käänne
content: Venäjän hallinnon ote maan kansalaisista tuntuu viime aikojen uutisten perusteella olevan lipsumassa. Viime viikolla kävi ilmi, että sotaväsymys venäläisten keskuudessa on selvästi kasvamassa , ja jopa maan hallinto on nyt asiasta sisäpiirilähteiden mukaan huolissaan . Samalla viikolla tunnettu propagandisti Vladimir Solovjov vihjaili Kurskin epäonnistumisesta asti hiljaisuuden ympäröimänä olleen presidentti Vladimir Putinin kuolemalla. Alkavatko hikikarpalot siis viimein valua myös Kremlin päättäjien otsalla sen suhteen, mitä kansalaiset Ukrainassa käytävästä sodasta ja sen vaikutuksista tuumaavat? – Kyllä tämä tuntuu tuottavan koko ajan etenevässä määrin haasteita, koska on nähtävissä se, että sotaväsymys ja tyytymättömyys kasvavat ja sen kautta myös sisäiset jännitteet nousevat, vastaa Ulkopoliittisen instituutin tutkija Jussi Lassila . Sotaväsymyksen kasvu kävi ilmi riippumattoman Levada-tutkimuskeskuksen kyselytutkimuksesta. Iltalehti uutisoi aiemmin, että sen vastauksista ilmeni muun muassa myös se, että 72 prosenttia venäläisistä tukisi Putinia päätöksessä, jossa Ukrainan sota lopetettaisiin välittömästi. Lassilan mukaan vastaukset osoittavat kuitenkin rauhantoiveiden sijaan enemmänkin sen, että kansa seuraa edelleen Putinin päätöksiä. – Siinä kysytään kysymys nimenomaan sillä tavalla, että jos Putin päättäisi ensi viikolla lopettaa sodan, niin olisitko valmis tukemaan tätä vastausta. Jos kysymys...

PHE OSES Bakal Bor Sumur Baru, Potensinya 41,35 Juta Barel Minyak
content: PHE OSES Bakal Bor Sumur Baru, Potensinya 41,35 Juta Barel Minyak Shafira Cendra Arini - detikFinance Rabu, 16 Okt 2024 12:02 WIB Migas - Foto: Ilustrasi Migas (Fauzan Kamil/Infografis detikcom) Jakarta - PT Pertamina Hulu Energi Offshore Southeast Sumatra (PHE OSES) tengah mempersiapkan diri untuk melakukan pengeboran sumur baru yakni Sumur Ambar-4 pada bulan Oktober ini. Adapun sumur tersebut mengandung potensi sumberdaya hidrokarbon sebesar 41,35 juta barel minyak. General Manager PHE OSES Antonius Dwi Arinto mengatakan tahun ini pihaknya mengupayakan strategi pengeboran untuk mencapai target produksi, meliputi target pengeboran sumur pengembangan baru. Selain upaya peningkatan produksi minyak dan gas dari Anjungan Cinta, pertengahan Oktober ini dijadwalkan pengeboran Sumur Ambar-4. "Sumur Ambar-4 ini berpotensi memiliki sumber daya hidrokarbon sebesar 41,35 juta barel minyak," kata Arianto, dalam keterangan tertulis, Rabu (16/10/2024). ADVERTISEMENT SCROLL TO CONTINUE WITH CONTENT Arianto menjelaskan, Sumur Ambar-4 ini berlokasi di dekat perairan Lampung Timur, dan sekitar 150 kilometer (km) dari pesisir utara Jakarta. Ditargetkan produksinya dapat dimulai pada 2029 mendatang. title: Tyra Banks: Spektakuläres Comeback bei der Victoria's Secret Show
creator: SpotOn
content: Nach sechs Jahren Pause war es in der Nacht von Dienstag auf Mittwoch (16.10.) deutscher Zeit endlich wieder so weit: Die legendäre Victoria's Secret Show lockte in New York City das Who–is–Who der internationalen Modelszene an. Auch das Supermodel Tyra Banks (50) feierte dort ihr viel umjubeltes Comeback, nachdem sie sich eigentlich im Jahr 2005 von den Laufstegen dieser Welt verabschiedet hatte. Unter tosendem Applaus präsentierte sie sich zunächst als Moderatorin selbstbewusst wie eh und je, bevor sie sich in einem kristallbesetzten, schwarzen Bustier inklusive Corsage auch als Model zeigte. Ihr überzeugendes Outfit kombinierte sie mit glitzernden High Heels und einem silbernen Umhang mit schwarzem Futter. Auch andere absolute Superstars liessen sich die Wiederauferstehung der Show mit den weltbekannten Dessous und den legendären Engelsflügeln nicht entgehen. Adriana Lima (43) und Gigi Hadid (29) sowie Candice Swanepoel (35), Behati Prinsloo (36) und Barbara Palvin (31) zeigten auf der Veranstaltung der Unterwäschemarke unterschiedliche Dessous. Als Special–Guests erschienen zudem überraschend Kate Moss (50) und Carla Bruni (56). 2019 war die Modenschau eigentlich zuletzt angesetzt gewesen, wurde jedoch anschliessend abgesagt. In der Hochphase der #MeToo–Bewegung prasselte damals harsche Kritik auf das Unternehmen ein. Der Vorwurf: Victoria's Secret sei ein toxischer Arbeitsplatz, der vor allem Frauen diskriminiere und zu Objekten degradiere. Unter der neuen...

title: Varane buông lời cay đắng về mùa cuối ở Manchester United
creator: Thethao247
content: Trung vệ người Pháp Raphael Varane tiết lộ rằng anh đã nhận ra thời điểm phải dừng lại ngay từ mùa giải cuối cùng tại Manchester United do những vấn đề về chấn thương. Trong cuộc phỏng vấn mới đây với tờ L'Equipe, Raphael Varane đã lần đầu tiên chia sẻ chi tiết về của mình. Cựu trung vệ Real Madrid thừa nhận rằng ý định treo giày đã manh nha từ đầu mùa giải cuối cùng của anh tại Manchester United, dù ban đầu anh vẫn mong muốn kết thúc sự nghiệp tại đội bóng nước Anh. , Varane tâm sự. Sau khi rời Manchester United, Varane đã tìm kiếm một thử thách mới tại Serie A cùng CLB Como. Tuy nhiên, số phận đã không đứng về phía anh khi một chấn thương đầu gối nghiêm trọng xảy ra vào ngày 11/7, trong trận đấu với Sampdoria tại Cúp Quốc gia Ý. Ngay từ thời điểm đó, trung vệ người Pháp đã nhận ra rằng sự nghiệp của mình đã đến hồi kết. Varane chia sẻ về thời khắc định mệnh đó. Varane giải thích thêm về tình trạng chấn thương dai dẳng của mình: Nhìn lại sự nghiệp, Varane có thể tự hào về những thành tích đã đạt được. Trong màu áo Real Madrid, anh đã giành được 4 Champions League, 3 La Liga và 4 FIFA Club World Cup. Ở cấp độ đội tuyển quốc gia, anh cũng đã cùng đội tuyển Pháp đăng quang World Cup 2018. Tại...

title: Интензивен трафик за камиони на границите с Румъния, Гърция и Турция
content: Интензивен е трафикът на вход за товарни автомобили на част от граничните контролно-пропускателните пунктове (ГКПП) с Румъния и Турция и на вход на границата с Гърция, съобщиха от Главна дирекция „Гранична полиция“ на МВР. Информацията е актуална към 6:00 часа тази сутрин. По границата с Румъния трафикът на ГКПП „Кардам“ и „Никопол“ е интензивен на вход за товарни автомобили, а на „Русе“ – на вход и изход за леки автомобили. Това предаде БТА. Поради извършване на основен ремонт на българския участък на Дунав мост при Русе е въведена временна организация на движение, като трафикът се осъществява в една лента с пропускателен режим и се регулира със светофарна уредба. Освен ГКПП „Русе“, шофьорите в региона могат да се насочат и към пунктовете „Силистра“, „Кардам“, „Дуранкулак“, „Кайнарджа“ и „Крушари“. Последните два са с работно време от 8:00 до 20:00 часа всеки ден, през тях не се пропускат товарни автомобили. Трафикът на ГКПП „Кулата“ по границата с Гърция е интензивен на изход за товарни автомобили. През граничните пунктове „Маказа", „Златоград“ и „Ивайловград“ е разрешено преминаването само на леки коли и микробуси. По границата с Република Турция трафикът на ГКПП „Капитан Андреево“ е интензивен на вход за товарни автомобили. Трафикът е нормален на всички гранични контролно-пропускателни пунктове по границата със Сърбия и Република Северна Македония. На ГКПП „Гюешево“ по границата с Република Северна Македония стартира изпълнението на дейностите по договор, свързан с...

title: Trump calls for tariffs of 2000pc
Cường kích Su-25 bắt đầu tấn công ồ ạt bằng rocket Zuni
content: Đoạn video về vụ không kích đã được đăng tải trên kênh Telegram Sunflower, cho thấy những quả rocket không điều khiển cỡ 127 mm của Mỹ bắn trúng và tác động trực tiếp lên tòa nhà nơi binh sĩ đóng quân. Cần lưu ý, rocket được phóng bởi máy bay tấn công mặt đất Su-25 thuộc Lữ đoàn hàng không chiến thuật số 299 - đơn vị thường xuyên thực hiện các chuyến bay nhằm hỗ trợ bộ binh và tấn công các vị trí của đối phương. Việc phóng rocket không điều khiển từ xa tuy tương đối khó và xác suất bắn trúng thấp, nhưng cho phép phi công bao quát khu vực và đôi khi đánh trúng các vị trí và công sự của đối phương. Máy bay tấn công mặt đất Su-25 có khả năng mang theo 4 bệ phóng LAU-10, được trang bị 4 quả rocket hạng nặng Zuni. Cần nói thêm, những báo cáo đầu tiên về việc chuyển giao rocket không điều khiển loại này sang Ukraine xuất hiện vào tháng 1 năm 2023, khi Lầu Năm Góc đưa 4.000 quả Zuni vào gói viện trợ quân sự. Tới tháng 5 năm 2023, bức ảnh đầu tiên về rocket Zuni được treo trên cường kích Su-25 đã xuất hiện, chúng được công bố bởi Tư lệnh Không quân Ukraine lúc bấy giờ - Trung tướng Mykola Oleschuk. Ngoài những bức ảnh về việc sử dụng rocket Zuni từ Su-25, vào đầu tháng 10 năm nay, đã xuất...

title: 현대차, 대학과 협업 ‘자동차 고장 예방’ 나선다
creator: 권재현 기자 jaynews@kyunghyang.com
content: 현대차그룹이 국내 대학 8곳과 협력해 차량의 고장을 미리 파악하는 기술 개발에 나선다. 현대차그룹은 서울대, 건국대, 성균관대, 인하대, 한국기술교육대, 한양대, 광주과학기술원(GIST), 울산과학기술원(UNIST) 등 8개 대학과 함께 차량의 고장 가능성을 예측하고 예방할 수 있는 ‘PHM(고장 예측 및 관리) 기술’을 개발하기 위한 공동 연구실을 설립한다고 16일 밝혔다. 현대차그룹과 각 대학은 공동 연구실을 통해 오는 2027년까지 PHM의 요소 기술과 차량에 탑재되는 하드웨어 및 소프트웨어 개발, PHM 플랫폼 개발을 위한 기반 기술을 함께 연구하기로 했다. 현대차그룹에 따르면 PHM 기술은 자율주행과 전동화 시대에 차량 시스템의 신뢰성을 높이는 핵심 요소다. 시스템의 복잡성 증가로 발생할 수 있는 잠재적 고장을 예측하고 관리하며 유지보수 비용 절감과 안전성 향상에 기여할 수 있기 때문이다. 공동 연구실은 차량 시스템의 고장을 실시간으로 예측하기 위한 센서 데이터 수집과 예측 알고리즘 최적화에 중점을 두고 관련 기술을 개발할 예정이다. 이를 통해 PHM 플랫폼을 차량 내장형 전자기기·컴퓨터 시스템 또는 클라우드 기반으로 구현해 고장 예측의 정확성을 높인다는 구상이다. 현대차·기아가 공동 연구실을 총괄한다. PHM 기술 검증 및 양산 차량 적용을 목표로 연구를 진행할 계획이다. 산학협력 전문기관인 현대엔지비는 글로벌 전문가 네트워크를 통해 최신 연구 흐름을 파악하며, 이를 통해 참여 기관에...

title: Sexy andílci jsou zpět. Nechyběla Herzigová, Mossová poprvé i s dcerou
Cận cảnh nổ tung đường liên Triều, Hàn Quốc nổ súng: Nga hé lộ hành động nếu Triều Tiên bị tấn công
content: Triều Tiên cho nổ con đường liên Triều, Hàn Quốc nổ súng Hãng tin CNN (Mỹ) dẫn lời giới chức Hàn Quốc cho hay, Triều Tiên đã cho nổ tung một số đoạn của hai con đường chính nối liền với phần phía nam bán đảo (Hàn Quốc) trong ngày 15/10, sau khi Bình Nhưỡng cảnh báo sẽ tiến hành các bước để cắt đứt hoàn toàn lãnh thổ của mình khỏi miền Nam. Theo Hội đồng Tham mưu trưởng Liên quân (JCS) của Seoul, một số đoạn đường của tuyến Gyeongui ở bờ biển phía Tây và tuyến Donghae ở bờ biển phía Đông, hai tuyến đường bộ và đường sắt chính nối liền hai nước, đã bị phá hủy bằng thuốc nổ vào khoảng 12 giờ trưa ngày 15/10 theo giờ địa phương. Đoạn video do Bộ Quốc phòng Hàn Quốc công bố cho thấy một số vụ nổ trên các con đường ở phía bắc đường phân giới quân sự (MDL) chia cắt hai miền Triều Tiên. Ở phần sau đoạn video, các loại máy móc hạng nặng của Triều Tiên, bao gồm xe tải và máy xúc, đã được triển khai tới ít nhất một trong những con đường họ vừa cho nổ và đang bị chặn một phần bởi chiếc rào chắn màu đen. JSC cho biết, Triều Tiên đang "tiến hành các công việc bổ sung bằng máy móc hạng nặng tại hiện trường", nhưng không nêu rõ thêm chi tiết. Để đáp trả các vụ nổ, quân...

title: Nekompromisní novinka nadchne fotoaparátem. Parametry má famózní
SUV điện BYD Sea Lion 07 ra mắt tại châu Âu, đối đầu trực tiếp với Tesla Model Y
creator: Thethao247
content: Theo kế hoạch, BYD Sea Lion 07 sẽ bắt đầu được giao hàng tại Anh vào cuối tháng 10 với giá khởi điểm khoảng 45.000 bảng Anh (tương đương 1,468 tỷ đồng). BYD tiếp tục đẩy mạnh tốc độ mở rộng tại châu Âu với mẫu SUV điện Sea Lion 07, đối thủ trực tiếp của Tesla Model Y. Mẫu xe này vừa ra mắt thị trường châu Âu tại Triển lãm Ô tô Paris 2024, dự kiến sẽ bắt đầu giao hàng ngay trong tháng 10 này. Sea Lion 07 là mẫu xe điện thứ tám trong dải sản phẩm của BYD tại châu Âu, thuộc "Ocean Series" cùng với các mẫu Dolphin, Seal và Seal U. Tuy nhiên, câu hỏi đặt ra là liệu Sea Lion 07 có đủ sức để thực sự thách thức vị thế của Tesla trên thị trường xe điện hay không? Ra mắt lần đầu tại Trung Quốc vào tháng 11 năm ngoái, Sea Lion 07 được áp dụng ngôn ngữ thiết kế quen thuộc của BYD. Đầu xe có cụm đèn pha tương tự như Seal U, kết hợp với các hốc hút gió thể thao. Đuôi xe có thiết kế mui dốc cùng với dải đèn hậu LED chạy ngang, gợi nhớ đến mẫu sedan Seal. Dù mang phong cách hiện đại, thiết kế của BYD Sea Lion 07 không có nhiều sự đột phá và có thể dễ bị nhầm lẫn với nhiều mẫu SUV điện khác trên thị trường. Sea Lion 07 được xây dựng dựa trên nền tảng e-Platform 3.0 Evo của BYD, hỗ trợ cả cấu hình động...

title: Poljski vratar o trenutku 'hrvatskog ludila': Osjećali smo se beznadno, ali...
content: Poljska je povela u samom otvaranju utakmice golom (5), Hrvatska je preokrenula s tri gola u samo šest minuta preko (20), (24) i (26) da bi pred kraj prvog poluvremena (45) smanjio na 3:2. U drugom poluvremenu je (69) pogodio za konačnih 3:3. Hrvatska je od 76. minute igrala s igračem manje nakon što je isključen . 'Bila je to apsolutno luda utakmica. Počeli smo dobro, ali smo onda primili tri gola u svega nekoliko minuta. Osjećali smo se beznadno, ali uspjeli smo se vratiti. Drago mi je da smo otišli s bodom, ali žao mi je što nismo postigli i četvrti', kazao je vratar francuske Nice. 'Mislim da smo mogli dobiti ovu utakmicu. Imali smo svoje trenutke, dobro smo se osjećali na terenu. Hrvatska je također imala svoje trenutke kada nam je zabila tri gola, ali u svlačionici smo si rekli da se ne smijemo predati, moramo visoko pritiskati, držati loptu i prilike će doći', dodao je veznjak za TVP Sport. 'Malo tko je u pauzi očekivao da će nakon posljednjeg zvižduka remi biti malo razočaranje za naše igrače. Nakon crvenog kartona Livakovića imali smo još nekoliko prilika. Imao sam i ja jednu priliku, drugi put moram bolje pucati', dodao je veznjak Bologne. Uoči zadnja dva kola na ljestvici skupine vodi Portugal sa deset bodova, Hrvatska ima sedam, Poljska četiri, a Škotska jedan bod. 'Glava gore, uskoro ide sljedeći meč. Imamo puno potencijala, pokazali smo to i protiv Hrvatske', poručio je . 'Prelako smo primali golove. Bilo je pogrešaka u našoj...

title: Los concursos gastronómicos dan una nueva vida a los restaurantes de pueblo
creator: Saray Fajardo
content: Ganar un premio no sólo es obtener un trofeo o un diploma que acrediten la victoria y con el que presumir delante del entorno más cercano, sino que en muchas ocasiones también es sinónimo de visibilidad. Los concursos gastronómicos son una prueba de ello . L’Alcúdia acogió este lunes el XV Concurso Nacional del Puchero Valencian o, que, en esta ocasión, coronó al restaurante Juan XXIII de Benifaió , que se enfrentó a una docena de locales procedentes de distintas zonas. Aunque todavía no han pasado 48 horas desde que este local se proclamara como el que mejor cocina este plato caliente, ya son muchos los curiosos que se acercan al restaurante para degustar el mejor puchero. «La gente del pueblo se alegra y vienen a pedirnos puchero», reconoce el cocinero Jesús Lapeña , quien se encuentra inmerso en la cocina preparando los menús del día. Este local ya sabe qué significa obtener el primer premio en este certamen, ya que se proclamaron vencedores en la segunda edición y ahora vuelven a repetir . Sin duda, su plato estrella es el puchero. Ahora todavía lo es más, ya que, según el jurado del concurso, son el local que mejor lo cocina. «Aumenta la clientela porque la gente quiere venir a probar el plato ganador, por lo que acuden de toda la comarca», explica Lapeña, quien recalca que «es un apasionado de los concursos por la visibilidad que aportan». El equipo del restaurante Miguel y Juani de l’Alcúdia también sabe de primera mano qué significa ganar un...

title: El conseller de Agricultura, Miguel Barrachina, conmemora el Día de la Mujer Rural en la cooperativa Cofrudeca de Bèlgida
creator: Perales Iborra
content: El conseller de Agricultura, Miguel Barrachina, visitó ayer la cooperativa Cofrudeca de Bèlgida para presentar un paquete de ayudas con motivo del Día de la Mujer Rural . Aunque la participación femenina ha ganado terreno en los últimos años, todavía queda un largo camino por recorrer para alcanzar la paridad de género en la mayoría de las áreas de representación y toma de decisiones. Barrachina anunció ayer que la Conselleria destinará el próximo año 200.000 euros para impulsar el papel de la mujer rural en la Comunitat Valenciana.

title: Las trabajadoras agrícolas consolidan su labor en la Costera, la Vall y la Canal
creator: Emma Gómez Pastor
content: Los trabajos en el campo han sido tradicionalmente desempeñados por hombres. No obstante, cada vez más mujeres desempeñan un papel fundamental en el ámbito cooperativo. Así lo determina el último «Informe de participación de mujeres en las cooperativas agroalimentarias valencianas» de Cooperatives Agro-alimentàries de la Comunitat Valenciana , según el cual las mujeres representan un 43,34 % del total de trabajadores de las 25 cooperativas asociadas de la Costera , la Vall d'Albaida y la Canal de Navarrés . El conseller de Agricultura, Miguel Barrachina, visitó ayer una de estas cooperativas para presentar un paquete de ayudas con motivo del Día de la Mujer Rural. Aunque la participación femenina ha ganado terreno en los últimos años, todavía queda un largo camino por recorrer para alcanzar la paridad de género en la mayoría de las áreas de representación y toma de decisiones. El análisis de las cifras nos permite observar tanto los avances como los desafíos pendientes. Uno de los datos más significativos es la representación de las mujeres socias en las cooperativas de estas tres comarcas. De un total de 12.936 personas socias, solo el 22,06 % son mujeres , lo que equivale a 2.853 socias en conjunto. Este porcentaje varía según la comarca: en la Costera, las mujeres representan el 33% de las socias, mientras que en la Canal de Navarrés y la Vall d'Albaida, los porcentajes son más bajos, con un 19 % y un 21 %, respectivamente. title: آغاز اجلاسیه شهدای شهرستان شاهرود
content: به گزارش از ، اجلاسیه یک هزار و یکصد شهید شهرستان شاهرود و یک هزار و 700 شهید منتسب به این شهرستان با حضور مدیران استانی آغاز شد. این اجلاسیه از شامگاه سه‌شنبه در محدوده بین مصلای شاهرود تا گلزار شهدای این شهر آغاز شده و تا بیست و ششم مهرماه ادامه خواهد یافت. سرهنگ محمدمهدی اسماعیلی، فرمانده ناحیه مقاومت شهرستان شاهرود در گفت‌وگو با خبرنگار تسنیم، اظهار داشت: همزمان با برگزاری این اجلاسیه، نمایشگاه طرح اسوه استان سمنان نیز گشایش یافته است. وی افزود: 82 غرفه در نمایشگاه استانی طرح اسوه فعال شده است که از این تعداد 74 غرفه مربوط به پایگاه اسوه استانی و 6 غرفه نیز مربوط پایگاه بنیاد تعاون بسیج است که در نمایشگاه طرح اسوه استان در اجلاسیه حضور یافته‌اند. اسماعیلی با اشاره به فضاسازی‌های صورت گرفته در محل نمایشگاه گفت: در این مسیر که به نام "مسیر آسمانی" نامگذاری شده است؛ عملیات والفجر 8 و پل خیبری شهید حسین غنیمت‌پور برای بازدید کنندگان بازنمایی شده و 50 دانش‌آموز با لباس مخصوص به صورت نمادین و در برنامه‌ای رزمی و فرهنگی، برای فتح قدس اقدام می‌کنند. وی با اشاره به دیگر برنامه‌های این اجلاسیه، گفت: مسابقات دانش‌آموزی، استقرار مواکب خادم یاران رضوی، فضاسازی بین‌الحرمین، برگزاری نمایشگاه‌های سبک زندگی اسلامی، نمایشگاه زنان تمدن‌ساز، برنامه‌‌های ویژه سازمان‌های پشتیبانی کننده از دفاع مقدس شامل جهاد، منابع طبیعی و آبخیزداری و امور عشایری، سواد رسانه و آموزش هوش مصنوعی از جمله اقدامات و برنامه‌های ورود به مصلای نماز جمعه در اجلاسیه خواهد بود. فرمانده ناحیه مقاومت بسیج سپاه شاهرود با اشاره به اینکه در هر سه شب برگزاری اجلاسیه از ظرفیت‌های سخنرانان کشوری و لشکری استفاده می‌شود،...

title: Четыре человека погибли при пожаре в Свердловской области
creator: Виктория Бурякова
content: Четыре человека, среди которых был восьмилетний ребенок, погибли при пожаре в Березовском городском округе Свердловской области. Об этом 16 октября сообщает источник «Известий». Тела трех людей нашли в сгоревшем доме, а еще одно обнаружили на улице. Оно принадлежит мужчине, личность и возраст которого еще не установили. Предполагается, что причиной пожара послужило нарушение правил безопасности при использовании домашней печи. Обстоятельства и детали трагедии выясняются. Ранее, 10 октября, в пресс-службе МЧС России сообщили, что в Республике Марий Эл во время пожара в частном доме погиб ребенок . В доме проживали женщина, четверо детей и двое пожилых людей.

title: Foundation stones laid for road works
creator: Deekshitula Subrahmanyam
content: Rajamahendravaram: Minister for Tourism, Culture, and Cinematography Kandula Durgesh laid foundation stones for various road works in the Nidudavolu Rural mandal on Tuesday, the second day of ongoing Palle Panduga celebration. Speaking at the event, the minister announced the development of 326 meters of road in Vijjeswaram at a cost of Rs 15.15 lakh, which will enhance connectivity in four locations. He also inaugurated additional classroom facilities at the Mandal Parishad Primary School in Gopavaram, at a cost of Rs 25.24 lakh. Other projects include the development of 283 meters of road in Kalavacharla at a cost of Rs 17.10 lakh, 283 meters in Jidugunta for Rs 13.50 lakh, and 128 meters in Korupalli for Rs 13.62 lakh. Additionally, road works spanning 274 meters were launched in Pendyal at a cost of Rs 16.44 lakh. Similar development initiatives were also commenced in Munipalli, Velivennu, Settipeta, and Tallapalem. The minister highlighted that villages have lagged in development over the past five years, and the coalition government is prioritising the provision of essential infrastructure in these areas.

title: '2000억 냉동육 투자 사기' 선하증권으로 속였나...경찰 수사
creator: 양효원 기자
content: [수원=뉴시스] 양효원 기자 = 지난 4월 경찰에 첫 고소장이 들어온 수입 냉동육 투자 사기 사건 피해자가 137명에 달하는 것으로 확인됐다. 이들이 호소하는 피해 규모는 2000억원 이상이다. 16일 경기남부경찰청 반부패·경제범죄수사대에 따르면 이날 기준 경찰이 접수한 고소장은 137건이다. 경찰은 이 사건 주범으로 알려진 축산물 유통업체 대표 A씨 등 20여명을 사기 혐의로 입건해 조사하고 있다. 경찰에 입건된 피의자들은 A씨와 A씨 회사에 투자토록 피해 투자자들을 모은 투자업체 관계자, 냉동육을 보관한 냉동창고 업체 관계자 등이다. A씨 등은 수입 냉동육을 저렴한 가격에 구매한 뒤 가격이 오른 시점에 판매해 수익을 내주겠다고 속여 투자금을 받은 뒤 돌려주지 않은 혐의를 받는다. 이 사건 피해자들은 A씨가 자신의 실제 구매량과 상관없이 최초 소고기 수입 업자의 선하증권번호(B/L)를 받을 수 있는 점을 악용해 범죄를 저질렀다고 주장한다. 선하증권번호는 해상 운송 계약 체결 증거로 수입품에 대한 운송장이다. 이 서류에는 수입품 종류와 물량 등이 담긴다. 피해자 B씨는 뉴시스와 통화에서 "A씨는 다른 소고기 유통 업자가 수입하는 수백t 육류 가운데 소량을 구매한 뒤 수백t 선하증권번호(B/L)를 받아 피해자에게 보여줬다"며 "(우리는) A씨가 수백t 상당 육류를 구매해 냉동창고에 보관하는 것으로 알고 투자했다"고 설명했다. B씨는 2018년께부터 올해 초까지 A씨 회사에 약 450억원을 투자했다. 또 A씨는 냉동창고 업자와 공모해...

title: पडघम विधानसभेचे : 'महायुती'सह 'आघाडीसमोर'ही बंडखोरांचे आव्हान
creator: पुढारी वृत्तसेवा
content: हिरा सरवदे महायुती आणि महाविकास आघाडीमध्ये जागा वाटप अंतिम झालेले नसले तरी इच्छुकांकडून जोरदार तयारी केली जात आहे. त्यामुळे आगामी विधानसभा निवडणुकीत जागा टिकवताना विद्यमान आमदारांची चांगलीच दमछाक होणार आहे. दुसरीकडे इच्छुकांना महायुती, महाविकास आघाडी, मनसे, वंचित, तिसरी आघाडी यांसारखे विविध पर्याय उपलब्ध असल्याने शहरातील सर्वच आठही मतदार संघात कांटे की टक्कर पहायला मिळणार आहे. या सर्व पार्श्वभूमीवर बंडखोरीला लगाम लावण्याचे आव्हान महायुती व महाविकास आघाडीसह सर्वच पक्षांसमोर असणार आहे. पुणे शहरात आठ मतदार संघाची विभागणी पुणे, बारामती आणि शिरूर अशा तीन लोकसभा मतदार संघात होते. शिवाजीनगर, कोथरूड, पर्वती, कसबा पेठ, पुणे कॅन्टोमेन्ट आणि वडगाव शेरी या सहा मतदारसंघाचा समावेश पुणे लोकसभा मतदारसंघात आहे. खडकवासला विधानसभा मतदारसंघ बारामती तर हडपसर मतदारसंघ शिरूर लोकसभा मतदार संघात येतो. नुकत्याच झालेल्या लोकसभा निवडणुकीचा विचार करता हडपसर आणि पुणे कॅन्टोमेन्टमध्ये महाविकास आघाडीला तर उर्वरीत सहाही मतदारसंघात महायुती ला मताधिक्य मिळाले. मात्र, लोकसभा निवडणुकीत महाराष्ट्रात महायुतीची झालेली पिछेहाट आणि महाविकास आघाडीला मिळालेल्या अभुतपूर्व यशाच्या पार्श्वभूमीवर आगामी विधानसभा निवडणुकीची गणित बदलणार आहेत. लोकसभा निवडणुकीनंतर झालेल्या विविध सर्वेमध्ये विधानसभा निवडणुकीत ही महाराष्ट्रात महाविकास आघाडीला यश मिळणार असल्याचे सांगितले जात आहे. त्यामुळे महायुतीच्या विद्यमान आमदारांसह अनेक इच्छुकांचा ओढा महाविकास आघाडीची उमेदवारी पदरात पाडून घेण्याकडे आहे. पश्चिम महाराष्ट्राचा विचार करता शरद पवार यांच्या राष्ट्रवादीकडे इच्छुकांचा सर्वाधिक ओढा दिसतो. विधानसभेची निवडणुक पुढील महिना दीडमहिन्यात...

title: ഉ​റ​ങ്ങു​ന്പോ​ൾ ഫോ​ൺ മെ​ത്ത​യ്ക്ക് താ​ഴെ വ​യ്ക്കാ​റു​ണ്ടോ, ഫോ​ണു​മാ​യി ബാ​ത്ത് റൂ​മി​ല്‍ പോ​കാ​റു​ണ്ടോ: സൂ​ക്ഷി​ക്കു​ക നി​ങ്ങ​ളി​ൽ അ​ണു​ബാ​ധ​യ്ക്കു​ള്ള സാ​ധ്യ​ത ഏ​റെ​യെ​ന്ന് പ​ഠ​നം
creator: Rashtra Deepika
content: യു​കെ ആ​സ്ഥാ​ന​മാ​യു​ള്ള മെ​ത്ത​ക​ളു​ടെ വി​ത​ര​ണ​ക്കാ​രാ​യ മാ​റ്റ​റ​സ് നെ​ക്സ്റ്റ് ഡേ ​ന​ട​ത്തി​യ സ​ർ​വേ​യി​ൽ ഞെ​ട്ടി​ക്കു​ന്ന വി​വ​ര​ങ്ങ​ൾ ആ​ണ് പു​റ​ത്ത് വ​രു​ന്ന​ത്. യു​കെ​യി​ൽ ഏ​ക​ദേ​ശം 50 ദ​ശ​ല​ക്ഷ​ത്തോ​ളം ആ​ളു​ക​ൾ അ​വ​രു​ടെ ഫോ​ണു​ക​ൾ കി​ട​യ്ക്ക​രി​കി​ലാ​യി വെ​ച്ചു​കൊ​ണ്ടാ​ണ് ഉ​റ​ങ്ങു​ന്ന​ത്. അ​ണു​ബാ​ധ​യ്ക്ക് കാ​ര​ണ​മാ​കു​ന്ന ബാ​ക്ടീ​രി​യ​യാ​യ സ്യൂ​ഡോ​മോ​ണ​സ് എ​രു​ഗി​നോ​സ​യു​ടെ തോ​ത് സ​മാ​ർ​ട്ട് ഫോ​ണി​ൽ വ​ള​രെ കൂ​ടു​ത​ലാ​ണ്. അ​തി​നാ​ൽ ഫോ​ൺ കി​ട​ക്ക​യി​ൽ വ​ച്ച് ഉ​റ​ങ്ങു​ന്ന​ത് അ​ത്യ​ധി​കം ദോ​ഷ​മാ​ണ്. ടോ​യ്‌​ല​റ്റി​ൽ കാ​ണ​പ്പെ​ടു​ന്ന ബോ​ക്ടീ​രി​യ​യി​ൽ കൂ​ടു​ത​ലാ​ണ് ഒ​രു സ്മാ​ർ​ട്ഫോ​ണി​ൽ ഉ​ള്ള​തെ​ന്നാ​ണ് പ​ഠ​നം. സ്മാ​ർ​ട്ട്‌​ഫോ​ൺ ഉ​പ​യോ​ഗ​വും ശു​ചി​ത്വ നി​ല​വാ​ര​വും പ​ര​സ്പ​ര പൂ​രി​ത​മാ​ക​യാ​ൽ ഈ ​പ്ര​ശ്നം വ​ള​രെ ഗൗ​ര​വ​ത്തി​ൽ എ​ടു​ക്ക​ണ​മെ​ന്നാ​ണ് വി​ദ​ഗ്ധ​ർ പ​റ​യു​ന്ന​ത്. എ​ൻ​ഐ​എ​ച്ച് ന​ട​ത്തി​യ പ​ഠ​ന​ത്തി​ൽ പ​ങ്കെ​ടു​ത്ത 43 % മെ​ഡി​ക്ക​ൽ വി​ദ്യാ​ർ​ഥി​ക​ളും ശു​ചി​മു​റി​ക​ളി​ൽ ത​ങ്ങ​ളു​ടെ മൊ​ബൈ​ല്‍ ഫോ​ണു​ക​ൾ ഉ​പ​യോ​ഗി​ക്കു​ന്നു​ണ്ട്. അ​തി​ൽ 23 % ഉ​പ​യോ​ക്താ​ക്ക​ൾ മാ​ത്ര​മാ​ണ് ദി​വ​സ​വും ത​ങ്ങ​ളു​ടെ ഫോ​ണു​ക​ൾ അ​ണു​വി​മു​ക്ത​മാ​ക്കു​ന്ന​ത്. ഈ ​ബാ​ക്ടീ​രി​യ​ക​ൾ മൂ​ത്രാ​ശ​യ അ​ണു​ബാ​ധ​യ്ക്കും ദ​ഹ​ന​വ്യ​വ​സ്ഥ​യു​ടെ സ​ങ്കീ​ർ​ണ​ത​ക​ൾ​ക്കും കാ​ര​ണ​മാ​കാ​ൻ സാ​ധ്യ​ത​യു​ണ്ടെ​ന്ന് ഗ​വേ​ഷ​ക​ർ പ​റ​യു​ന്നു.

title: US tells Israel to improve Gaza humanitarian situation or risk military aid
creator: Reuters
content: The United States has told Israel it must take steps in the next month to improve the humanitarian situation in Gaza or face potential restrictions on US military aid, US officials said, in the strongest such warning since Israel’s war with Hamas began a year ago. US Secretary of State Antony Blinken and Defense Secretary Lloyd Austin wrote to Israeli officials on Sunday demanding concrete measures to address the worsening situation in the Palestinian enclave amid a renewed Israeli offensive in northern Gaza, US officials said on Tuesday. Failure to do so could impact US policy, said the letter, which was first reported by Israeli News 12. “We are particularly concerned that recent actions by the Israeli government ... are contributing to an accelerated deterioration in the conditions in Gaza,” said a copy of the letter posted by an Axios reporter on X. The letter cited restrictions Israel was imposing, including those on commercial imports, the denial of most humanitarian movements between northern and southern Gaza, and “burdensome and excessive” restrictions on what goods can enter Gaza. White House national security spokesperson John Kirby said the letter “was not meant as a threat” but reiterated the urgency of increasing humanitarian assistance in Gaza. “It appears to us that they (the Israelis) are taking this seriously,” Kirby said of the letter, without elaborating. An Israeli official in Washington said the letter had been received and was being reviewed. “Israel...

title: Police search for ‘amorous couple’ who accidentally flooded station, shut down city loop
creator: Stephen Brook
content: Victorians had been under the impression an act of vandalism caused the flooding that shut down two Melbourne train stations last week – until Transport Infrastructure Minister Danny Pearson fronted a media conference on Wednesday to reveal the cause had, in fact, been an “amorous couple”. The minister took a short period to work himself up to the revelation, explaining to the press corps outside parliament how a flood event had impacted both Melbourne Central and Flagstaff on Thursday, and that initial reports pointed to vandalism. The couple in question. But there was much more to the story, as the minister eventually found the words to explain. “I’ve been advised that Metro [trains] have reviewed the CCTV footage, and it would appear that an amorous couple in a stairwell dislodged the sprinkler ...” The minister trailed off and appeared at a loss as a burst of laughter erupted from the press corps. The city loop was thrown into chaos as patrons departed the concert by pop star Olivia Rodrigo . Investigators said offenders had damaged a water pipe and a fire sprinkler at about 10.40pm. Pearson attempted to delicately undress a matter no minister had ever before been called upon to do: an apparent attempted fornication in the city loop. “Metro will be investigating these matters further, and police are investigating,” he said. “Perhaps a stairwell might not be an appropriate place to find yourself in at the end of a dinner,” Pearson offered as advice. Who knew Melbourne...

title: 대원강업, 홀트아동복지회에 4000만원 전달
creator: 매일경제
content: 현대백화점그룹 계열 자동차부품전문기업인 대원강업은 홀트아동복지회에 장애인직업재활시설 지원금 4000만원을 전달했다고 16일 밝혔다. 이번에 전달한 지원금은 홀트아동복지회에서 운영하는 장애인직업재활시설 홀트보호작업장의 설비 구입 및 환경개선사업에 사용할 예정이다. 서울시 마포구 홀트아동복지회에서 열린 전달식에는 박민희 대원강업 사장, 신미숙 홀트아동복지회장 등이 참석했다. 박민희 대원강업 사장은 “이번 지원이 장애인 일자리 창출과 경제적 자립에 도움이 되길 바란다”며 “앞으로도 취약계층에 대한 지원 등 다양한 사회공헌 활동을 지속해 나가겠다”고 말했다.

title: 아라가야문화제, 함안 찾아온 몽골 자매도시 대표단
creator: 김기진 기자
content: [함안=뉴시스] 김기진 기자 = 경남 함안군은 국제 자매도시인 몽골 울란바토르시 항올구(구청장 체렌), 국내 자매도시인 전라남도 함평군(군수 이상익), 재부산함안향우회(회장 이기용), 재창원함안향우회(회장 박종기) 대표단은 최근 열린 제36회 아라가야문화제를 맞아 축하 방문했다고 16일 밝혔다. 몽골 울란바토르시 항올구는 함안군과 2011년 7월 자매결연을 맺어 13년간 교류해 오고 있으며, 토야체첵(G.Tuyatsetseg) 부서장을 비롯해 10명의 실무진으로 구성된 항올구 대표단은 향후 교류 협력에 대한 의견을 교환하고 ‘제36회 아라가야문화제’ 행사를 참관하기 위해 방문했다. 항올구 대표단은 지난 10일부터 13일까지 3박 4일의 일정 동안 환영식 및 아라가야문화제 개막식 참관 등 공식행사 이외에도 칠원읍에 위치한 주요 산업체 성신RST 시찰과 유네스코 세계유산인 말이산고분군을 비롯해 악양생태공원, 입곡군립공원, 대암 이태준 기념관 등을 찾았다. 아울러 전남 함평군은 함안군과 지난해 8월 자매결연 협약을 체결해 교류해 오고 있으며, 이번 아라가야문화제를 축하하기 위해 임만규 부군수를 비롯한 4명의 대표단이 방문해 아라가야문화제 개막식을 참관했다. 고향을 떠나 타지에서 활동 중인 향우들로 구성된 재창원향우회 또한 지난 11일 함안을 방문해 아라가야문화제 개막식을 참관하고 고향에서 열리는 대표적인 축제를 축하했다. 아울러 재부산함안향우회는 지난 12일 입곡군립공원 운동장에서...

title: 여 수도권비전특위 "민심 이반 심각...대통령실 인적 쇄신해야"
creator: 한재혁 기자
content: [서울=뉴시스] 한재혁 기자 = 국민의힘 수도권비전특별위원회는 16일 "수도권의 민심 이반은 심각하다"라며 대통령실 내 인적 쇄신 및 제2부속실 신속 설치를 촉구했다. 오신환 수도권비전특위 위원장은 이날 서울 여의도 국회에서 열린 "최근 정치 현실, 지금 돌아가는 상황이 너무나 매우 위중하고 엄중하다"며 이같이 밝혔다. 오 위원장은 "수도권의 민심은 우리 당도 변화하고, 용산의 대통령실과 국정운영도 변화하고 쇄신하라는 요구가 있다고 판단하고 있다"라며 "당정 지지율은 최악의 상황이다. 특히 수도권의 민심 이반은 심각하다"라고 주장했다. 이어 '김건희 공천개입 의혹'의 핵심 인물인 명태균씨를 겨냥해 "자칭 여론 전문가의 폭로전에 휘둘리는 당정에 대한 국민적 실망과 우려가 매우 증폭되고 있는 상황"이라며 "이런 상황에서 아무리 좋은 정책을 말하고 조직 대책을 강구해도 민심은 악화될 수 밖에 없다"며 우려를 표했다. 그러면서 "적당히 얼버무리고 비호한다고 이 어려운 상황을 돌파할 수는 없다"라며 "수도권특위 차원에서도 대책을 강구하고 실행에 옮기겠다는 약속을 드린다"라고 말했다. 또 "대통령실이 곧 제2부속실을 만든다고 한다. 늦어도 많이 늦었다"라며 "한동훈 대표가 얘기한 인적 쇄신과 관련해서도 그것이 김 여사의 라인이든 아니든 대통령실의 인적 쇄신은 반드시 필요하다"라고 강조했다. 오 위원장은"그동안 (특위) 내부적으로 당헌·당규와 시스템을 고쳐나가는 일들을 해왔고, 12월 임기...

title: The Block’s Secret Prize Money Rule Has Been Revealed After Jesse & Paige Quit The Show
creator: Rachel Choy
content: It’s been a question that most fans have been wondering since and halfway through filming: will and be forced to share their prize money with ? Well, it turns out that there’s a clause in the contestants’ contracts that won’t let this happen. An insider told that while the sisters were considering sharing their prize money with Jesse and Paige, producers shut the idea down immediately. “Producers have advised them that it is in their contract that they can’t split money with other contestants. The reason being that it promotes collusion and that could affect future seasons,” the source spilled. “In most competition reality [series] the contracts will state that you cannot make an agreement to split prize money and the reason is more obvious than what people would think. You can’t pal up with other contestants as it creates an advantage and that is unfair to the other competitors. “This is a first for the show. That a couple would leave midseason but they were very much made aware of forfeiting the profits of House One in Phillip Island.” Now, Maddy and Charlotte have had a pretty rough go of it on . Their fellow contestants have been treating them like shit, with and telling cameras that the sisters were “the most hated people on ”. Fans have rallied behind the sisters, and are hoping that they come out on top. “After what the girls have had to endure from the other no good contestants, I hope they make a shitload of money,” one person wrote on Facebook. “I hope the girls...
