title: Модульные корпуса увеличили вместимость саратовских детских лагерей
content: На заседании комитета Саратовской городской думы 15 октября 2024 года обсуждались итоги летней оздоровительной кампании. Заместитель главы администрации по социальной сфере Александр Пажитнев представил отчет о проделанной работе. В 2024 году на организацию детского отдыха из бюджета Саратова было выделено 329,3 миллиона рублей. Средняя стоимость путевки для остальных составила 26,2 тысячи рублей. "Это позволило обеспечить отдых 6 885 детям, из которых 80% (5 454 ребенка) отдохнули бесплатно", - сказал чиновник. Он добавил, что треть саратовских детей отдыхом остались не охвачены. Благодаря федеральному финансированию в размере 88,1 миллиона рублей, в лагерях "Звездочка", "Солнышко" и "Дружба" были построены новые модульные корпуса. Это увеличило вместимость лагерей на 153 места за смену, однако спрос все еще превышает предложение на 30%. Пажитнев отметил, что несмотря на 100% загрузку лагерей, возникали проблемы с нехваткой финансирования для обеспечения необходимым инвентарем. Вопрос о бюджете на летнюю кампанию 2025 года остается открытым.

title: 醉男鄰居家門口尿尿嗆警4句話 清醒後下場慘了
content: 記者黃翊婷/綜合報導 男子阿志(化名)今年3月間酒醉之後,竟在鄰居家門口隨地便溺,見到警方到場處理,還反嗆兩名警員「你是在拍三小」、「要不然我們試看看啦」等話,結果反而害自己吃上官司。台南地院法官日前審理此案,並依妨害公務執行罪判處阿志拘役30日,得易科罰金3萬元。 ▲阿志喝醉之後不僅隨地便溺,還對警員嗆聲。(示意圖/VCG,與本案當事人無關。) 判決書中記載,阿志今年3月某日凌晨1時許酒後因故在鄰居家門口尿尿,被目擊民眾通報警方到場處理,沒想到他見到兩名警員,竟嗆聲「你是在拍三小」、「你拍我家是在拍三小」、「你們再試看看」、「我跟你講啦,大家都住在這裡,要不然我們試看看啦」,反而當場被逮捕。 事後阿志酒醒接受偵查,對於上述行為均坦承不諱。檢方認為,此案有錄音譯文、密錄器畫面截圖、錄影光碟、110報案紀錄單、職務報告等證據,事證明確,因此依法將阿志起訴。 台南地院法官表示,阿志在警員依法執行職務時,施以脅迫及侮辱行為,侵害到警察機關執行職務的嚴正性,影響社會秩序及國家公務順利進行,考量到他已經坦承犯行,兼衡他的前科素行、智識程度及家庭經濟狀況,最終依妨害公務執行罪判處阿志拘役30日,得易科罰金3萬元,全案仍可上訴。 ● 《東森新媒體ETtoday》提醒您:未滿18歲禁止飲酒,飲酒過量,有害健康。

title: 遭辱靠爸!齊廷洹現身緩頰「自身修養不足」 致電苗縣府提1請求
content: ▲導演齊柏林之子齊廷洹針對「靠爸餘蔭」一事回應。(圖/攝影中心攝) 記者黃資真/新北報導 導演齊柏林之子齊廷洹11日受邀至苗栗圖書館演講,不料活動開始前卻收到承辦人徐姓女子誤傳「靠爸餘蔭」等羞辱訊息,因此氣憤離場。今(16日)齊出面受訪表示,當下確實很難過委屈,但他也致電苗栗教育處,希望不要處罰相關人員,同時感謝外界的關心與鼓勵。 齊廷洹還原事發經過,當下收到承辦人訊息的心情確實很糟、很委屈,畢竟自己也是拋棄個人生活與成就,為父親的理想跟志業去拚博,卻被這樣質疑,事後也只是想在個人臉書小小抱怨,沒想到會上新聞,引起這麼多人關注。 齊廷洹說,可能自身修養不夠好,當下情緒波動比較大,所以現場跟大家說抱歉後還是決定離開,但非常感謝熱情網友的溫暖支持,「畢竟環境教育推動不容易,也是生存困難的非營利組織。」 ▲收到訊息後齊廷洹向大家致歉,接著頭也不回地離開,承辦人徐女跟在後面不斷道歉 。(圖/記者楊永盛翻攝) 齊廷洹也緩頰表示,已致電苗栗教育處,希望不要懲處科長、處長或是承辦人,「這件事就只是一時說錯話,沒必要因為這樣就請辭就丟工作。」同時感謝鍾東錦縣長深夜特別發文,讓他備感溫暖。 此外,齊廷洹解釋他認知的「靠爸」一詞,應該是父親留下很多遺產,可以讓孩子後半輩子衣食無虞,但爸爸留下的大多是精神層次的影像,而不是實質資產,所以他還是要為自己的生計努力,「我寧可不被任何人知道,也不會走上這條路,只要我父親還在,只是很可惜父親還是先走了一步。」

title: 「台灣珍奶被偷」意外引爆網友怒吼!劉思慕籲:停止網路霸凌
content: ▲劉思慕在節目上對於罐裝珍奶的評論,引發網友怒火,卻意外演變成網路霸凌。(圖/翻攝自tiktok) 圖文/鏡週刊 誰能想到珍珠奶茶居然引發了網路怒火?從加拿大電視節目演變成網路霸凌?這一切堪稱始料未及,只因為「罐裝珍奶」! 在加拿大製播的真人實境秀《龍穴》(Dragons’ Den)第19季節目中,請到劉思慕(Simu Liu)出任嘉賓,與其他節目固定班底擔任創投評審,幫上節目提案爭取資金的投資人打分數。結果這天來自魁北克的Bobba創辦人夫妻菲塞特(Sebastien Fiset) 和佛芮奈特(Jess Frenette),來介紹他們的罐裝珍奶點子。劉思慕在檢查他們的產品包裝後,表示拒絕,因為他們沒提到珍奶是來自台灣的創意發明,然後就帶入了自己的想法加以重新包裝,某個程度來說是犯了文化挪用的錯誤。 [廣告]請繼續往下閱讀... 這段節目片段在製作單位釋出後,很快就引發網路輿論,大家也主動去找出更多相關片段,包括2位Bobba的業者真的對珍珠奶茶一無所知,表示因為不清楚珍珠到底是怎麼做的,所以他們就想出以果汁代替做成的珍珠,覺得這樣更健康。但其實這早就有了,就是所謂的「爆爆珠」。這些言論看在亞裔觀眾眼裡,真的是氣到快吐血。 也許不見得每個人都能理解珍奶到底是怎麼來的,但是劉思慕發言當中的「文化挪用」這幾個關鍵字,很快就引來網友的攻擊,讓Bobba官方不得不在社群媒體上道歉,「我們無意暗示我們的產品,比傳統的珍珠奶茶更好。」節目中唯一通過他們提案、願意投資他們的加籍印度裔創投家閔哈絲(Manjit Minhas),社群媒體也被網友洗版,讓她不得不發表聲明,表示經過調查跟思考後,撤回對Bobba的投資。 因為網友的怒火徹底爆發,乃至於對案主的各種死亡威脅也曾出不窮,劉思慕也在社群媒體上呼籲大家冷靜,「我想說的是,我們碰上一個關於文化挪用案例的討論,究竟該怎麼定義,什麼叫做剝削、什麼叫做致敬,什麼才叫做尊重,究竟什麼是界線。順帶一提,當天的談話討論卻引發了來自不同社群的正面積極與支援的聲浪,我對此覺得無比感激。」 但他同時也強調,停止對於節目中相關人士網路霸凌,「同時,我也知道提案人收到很多死亡威脅跟騷擾,這些行為到頭來是不對的,只是無止盡的霸凌是錯的、動輒威脅這樣是不對的,即使在網路上也不可以。」與其把所有的力氣拿來罵人,他認為這會失去此一事件所能帶來的正面意義,「就是我們該教育大眾,讓世界變好,讓大家都意識到,從文化角度來看,某些事情是不對的。」 至於網友攻擊節目當天其他的評審,採取漠視的態度,劉思慕對此也解釋,「不管大家在攝影機前說了什麼,或者沒說什麼,其實我們在休息室的時候,大家都說了很多、也都傾聽對方的意見,『我想多聽你這方面的想法,多跟我說。』但很可惜這些沒有被拍下來。」 ★《鏡週刊》關心您:若自身或旁人遭受身體虐待、精神虐待、性侵害、性騷擾,請立刻撥打110報案,再尋求113專線,求助專業社工人員。 更多鏡週刊報導 看不下去網路霸凌! 「尚氣」劉思慕脫粉J.K.羅琳:很不喜歡她現在這樣 珍妮佛羅培茲被問婚變謠言 劉思慕跳出來救駕 日本歌姬LiSA升格人母首次來台開唱 樂喊想念珍珠奶茶

title: 中環台軍演與南北韓邊境升溫有關? 國安局:北韓對中關係處於低潮
content: ▲國安局長蔡明彥。(圖/記者李毓康攝) 記者杜冠霖/台北報導 北韓15日炸毀連接南北韓的京義線、東海線連結道路,兩韓緊張關係加劇;且相關衝突與中共「聯合利劍-2024B」軍演時間點相近,外界關注中共是否在測試美軍有無能力應對台海及朝鮮半島危機。對此,國安局長蔡明彥今(16日)備詢時表示,美日韓峰會後,讓北韓有不安全感,因此南北韓去年8月後情勢就升溫,根據目前情資,北韓俄國關係加強,但北韓中共關係則處於低潮。 蔡明彥今赴立法院提出「國家情報工作暨國家安全局業務報告」並備質詢。國民黨立委黃仁表示,南北韓前3天發生嚴重衝突,跟中共發動軍演時機很巧妙,這是巧合,還是中共跟北韓互通消息? 蔡明彥回應,朝鮮半島安全情勢大概在去年8月以後升溫,原因則是美日韓峰會,對於朝鮮半島風險控管達成高層默契與協議,讓北韓有高度不安全感,從那時候開始,北韓就不斷對南韓騷擾。 黃仁進一步詢問,有學者說,中共利用朝鮮半島升溫進行軍演,就是要測試美軍有無能力同時應對朝鮮、台海危機,這樣的說法正確嗎?國安局有無掌握? 蔡明彥表示,會尊重也會參考學者的說法,就實際狀況來說,最近北韓、俄國關係積極改善加強中,反而中共跟北韓關係處於低潮,從雙方互動往來層級、中共對北韓批評,以及中共管制北韓物品到中國等等都可看出,他強調,就情資來看,北韓、俄國關係加強、北韓中共關係則處於低潮。

title: 女懷疑同居男友外遇 查看手機發現「媽媽被他性侵」畫面崩潰
content: ▲女在男友手機目睹可怕畫面。(圖/示意圖/達志影像) 記者李振慧/綜合報導 澳洲一名女子懷疑男友外遇好奇查看對方手機,沒想到目睹昏迷不醒的母親被男友性侵的變態影片,可怕發現除了為她的家庭帶來巨大震撼,也在她心中留下終身無法抹滅的傷痛。 來自南澳大利亞州的25歲男子,被控和女友同居時性侵女友母親。女友控訴,她因為懷疑男友所以查看了對方手機,意外發現男友性侵母親的多支影片。 女子表示,母親由於有酗酒習慣,時常喝到不省人事,也是後來看到影片才知道遭到性侵,「沒有人應該告訴他們的媽媽遇到這種事,我永遠不會忘掉她尖叫哭泣的樣子」,而她只要一想到男友對母親做了那樣的事後還碰她,覺得噁心痛苦。 女子表示,當男友住在家中時,母親展現出比男友自己家人更多的慷慨與愛,結果男友卻做出這種行為,「我身為子女,竟然讓這樣的人進到我們家,我感到羞愧,我們家再也無法和從前一樣」。 男子的惡行也讓法官艾倫(Anthony Allen)當庭痛批,女友和家人善心接納需要幫助的被告,讓他住進家中卻遭到可怕的背叛,判處他5年刑期,並且3年內不得假釋。 ● 《ETtoday新聞雲》關心您,尊重身體自主權,防治性騷擾及性侵害,請撥打113、110 ​

title: Affaire Grégory : où en est l'enquête, quarante ans après la mort du petit garçon ?
content: Le 16 octobre 1984, le corps de Grégory Villemin, âgé de quatre ans, est retrouvé, pieds et poings liés, dans la Vologne, une rivière des Vosges. Quarante ans plus tard, ce meurtre jamais élucidé fascine toujours la France. A force de resurgir dans les médias, la photo du petit garçon – avec son visage poupin, ses boucles brunes et son sweat gris et orange – est devenue familière. Depuis la mort de Grégory, ses parents, Christine et Jean-Marie Villemin, se battent sans relâche pour que leur fils ne tombe pas dans l'oubli. Et surtout, ils espèrent, un jour, connaître la vérité sur les circonstances du drame. "Jean-Marie Villemin ne lâchera jamais. Jamais un centimètre, jamais un pouce. Sa vie est un combat" , confiait sur France Inter Pat Perna, scénariste du roman graphique Grégory , publié le 3 octobre. Ses auteurs ont recueilli un témoignage inédit du père de l'enfant. "À 66 ans, je ne suis pas endurci, écrit Jean-Marie Villemin en préface de la BD . Au contraire, l'émotion est à fleur de peau et j'ai souvent pleuré en découvrant ces pages, et Christine aussi, tant elles retracent avec justesse la période la plus noire de notre vie." Condamné pour le meurtre en 1985 de Bernard Laroche, premier suspect dans cette affaire après les révélations de sa belle-sœur Murielle Bolle , Jean-Marie Villemin affirme, dans ce texte, regretter son geste, mais reste convaincu que son cousin est l'assassin de son fils. Le père de Grégory rend aussi...

title: Canadian doctors who provide euthanasia struggle with the ethics of killing vulnerable patients
creator: By MARIA CHENG and ANGIE WANG - Associated Press
content: TORONTO (AP) — A homeless man refusing long-term care, a woman with severe obesity, an injured worker given meager government assistance, and grieving new widows. All of them requested to be killed under Canada’s euthanasia system , and each sparked private debate among doctors and nurses struggling with the ethics of one of the world’s most permissive laws on the practice , according to an Associated Press investigation. As Canada pushes to expand euthanasia and more countries move to legalize it , health care workers here are grappling with requests from people whose pain might be alleviated by money, adequate housing or social connections. And internal data obtained exclusively by AP from Canada’s most populous province suggest a significant number of people euthanized when they are in unmanageable pain but not about to die live in Ontario's poorest and most deprived areas. Some doctors fear moving forward even with cases that meet Canada’s legal requirements, which allow euthanasia for people with “irremediable suffering” from serious but nonfatal medical conditions and disabilities . On private forums, doctors and nurses have expressed deep discomfort with ending the lives of vulnerable people whose deaths were avoidable, according to messages provided to AP by a participant on condition of anonymity due to their confidentiality. Some of the requests from the forums were approved and acted upon. Others were denied. But the discourse about patients who are poor, disabled...

title: Republicans challenge more than 63,000 voters in Georgia, but few removed, AP finds
creator: By JEFF AMY and CHARLOTTE KRAMON - Associated Press

title: Republicans challenge more than 63,000 voters in Georgia, but few removed, AP finds
creator: By JEFF AMY and CHARLOTTE KRAMON - Associated Press
content: ATLANTA (AP) — From Georgia's mountains to its Atlantic shore, challenges to the qualifications of voters have rolled in this summer and fall, part of a wide-ranging national effort coordinated by Donald Trump’s allies to enlist Republican activists to remove people they view as suspect from the voting rolls. Thus far, barely 1% of people called into question have been removed from the rolls or placed into challenged status, mostly because counties are disregarding challenges. But those who allege Georgia's voting rolls are bloated with ineligible voters are trying to change that, filing lawsuits and pushing the Trump-aligned State Election Board to order counties to do more. The Associated Press finds more than 63,000 Georgians have been challenged since July 1, when a law that could make it easier to uphold challenges partially took effect. The AP's survey covered Georgia's 39 most populous counties, as well as six other counties with challenge activity. That’s a big surge from 2023 and the first half of 2024, when the AP found that about 18,000 voters were challenged . And efforts are spreading geographically. They had been concentrated in majority-Democratic counties in metro Atlanta. But since July 1, 100 or more voters have been challenged in at least 20 counties statewide, including some heavily Republican areas. As the AP found earlier, county election officials continue rejecting the vast majority of challenges. Fewer than 800 voters since July 1 — mostly in the...

title: El Estado clientelar-asistencial ampliado: ¿más impuestos?
creator: Rosario Espinal
content: Rosario Espinal En un Estado corrupto y clientelar los programas sociales son limitados en cobertura y calidad. Por eso, aunque la economía dominicana ha crecido durante los últimos cincuenta años, no ha mostrado una mejoría sustancial en los índices de desarrollo social. A partir de 2004, Leonel Fernández se propuso establecer un Estado asistencial mediante la ampliación de programas sociales. Impulsó el programa de transferencias Solidaridad, tal cual ocurría en otros países de América Latina, pero el énfasis siguió en las obras de infraestructura. A partir de 2012, Danilo Medina amplió el Estado asistencial. El buque insignia fue el 4% del PIB para la educación, con la consecuente tanda extendida que representó un importante subsidio a las familias de escasos recursos. Puede leer: La propuesta de reducción de diputados: no es ahorro, es política En el 2020, la pandemia del Covid-19 disparó el gasto público en asistencia social. Además, llegó al poder el PRM con necesidad de acomodar su clientela política en el Estado, que el PLD había copado en 16 años consecutivos de gobiernos. En estos años recientes, el porcentaje de la población que recibe de manera directa recursos públicos (empleos, subsidios sociales, pensiones) aumentó de 37% en el 2020 a 47% en el 2023. Y la República Dominicana se coloca entre los países de la región con mayor porcentaje de empleados públicos: 13.7% (datos del CREES). El aumento en gastos corrientes del Estado...

title: Conveniente, necesario y urgente diálogo Haití-RD
creator: TELÉSFORO ISAAC
content: Telésforo Isaac Es conveniente, necesario y urgente un diálogo entre Haití y República Dominicana . De ambas naciones, los regentes gubernamentales, dirigentes religiosos, líderes políticos, administradores de empresas bancarias y comerciales, los eruditos de asuntos legales, los ilustrados académicos, los mayordomos de fincas agrícolas, los ocupados en construcciones, etcétera, deben apoyar y ayudar para propiciar, con urgencia, un diálogo conveniente y necesario para tratar de mitigar el conflicto entre las dos naciones. En las Sagradas Escrituras y la historia secular, hay múltiples ejemplos de personas de sencillez y sinceridad; pero hay dos figuras que se destacan, de manera sobresaliente, en esas virtudes: Samuel, el hijo de Ana; y Jesús, el hijo de Dios, engendrado en María la Virgen. Puede leer: Deportaciones masivas, debido proceso y contexto Al mencionar estos destacados personajes, y reflexionar sobre las cualidades que nos han dotado, se entiende que es práctico sugerir una forma para obtener armonía y paz. Es conveniente corresponder a la Santa Voluntad de Dios el misericordioso. El hecho de pensar y escribir acerca de las personalidades antes mencionadas (Samuel y Jesús), obedece a la necesidad de analizar las capacidades proyectadas en ellos, que son símbolos auténticos de humildad, sencillez y sinceridad. Esas virtudes se conjugan para ser verdaderos modelos de dignos servidores, y ejemplos de vida para personas y comunidades que están...

title: 試開箱/倒數月曆來了!DIOR金燦凡爾賽宮好華麗 正貨多達9樣更有收藏價值
content: 記者李薇/台北報導 圖/記者李薇攝、品牌提供 最近美妝圈除了周年慶盛事,緊接著年底的聖誕節也即將到來,已經有很多品牌開始釋出年度重頭戲「倒數月曆」的單品,以下就開始盤點已經可以預購的單品,每一格都精巧,還有限量驚喜,立刻手刀買起來。 #DIOR 2024聖誕倒數月曆,售價22,000元 年末派對的快樂歡愉一直是迪奧先生很喜歡的氛圍,凡爾賽宮舞會更是過去巴黎名流人士重要的時尚聚會,2024年DIOR再度攜手義大利當代藝術家Pietro Ruffo以凡爾賽宮為靈感,將金色大門上的太陽與百合花圖騰、方庭廣場的馬賽克磁磚、古典壁鐘以及小特里亞農宮中地毯上的絢麗花卉,以細膩筆觸勾勒出絕美的燙金刺繡圖騰,壯麗又華美。 延續過去的傳統,2024年的聖誕倒數月曆一樣以蒙田大道30號旗艦店為原型,中央立體設計的CD LOGO,打開瞬間展現出凡爾賽宮的華麗雕梁畫棟,24格小抽屜裡面都有滿滿驚喜,其中9格更都是正貨單品,還有一格是頂級香氛世家從未出現過的新香氣小巧蠟燭,而且開箱完之後,整個盒子還可以當作收納箱使用,裝小物飾品都實用。若於10月16日官方直播活動期間於線上旗艦店下單,前250名更可獲得金燦凡爾賽金緻水晶球。 在 Instagram 查看這則貼文 ET FASHION(@et.fashion)分享的貼文 #Maison Francis Kurkdjian 2024 Saint Honore限量跨年倒數日曆,售價34,800元 以巴黎創始店Saint Honore街5號為靈感,Maison Francis Kurkdjian的聖誕倒數月曆將店面佈置上冬青、槲寄生和杉木枝,運用燙金設計展現出對聖誕節慶的讚頌,僅倒數一周7天的短暫時光,更顯節日的珍貴,裡面收納了調香師Francis Kurkdjian經典代表之作,Baccarat Rouge 540水晶之燄的淡香精香氛身體油、724淡香精滾珠瓶、迷你耶誕冷杉香氛蠟燭等,還有一格為隱藏驚喜,都是很具標誌性、值得擁有收藏的香氛作品。 #Acqua di Parma 2024流金璀璨聖誕倒數月曆,售價21,800元 把義大利的精緻手工以及熱情奔放帶進節日,Acqua di Parma以流金璀璨為題,設計大型圓帽禮盒質感的倒數月曆,每一格都有著香氛與保養作品,超小巧可愛迷你攜帶瓶,不僅是對經典香水的收藏,更能讓旅行假期也感受到香氛帶來的放鬆愉悅,從潔膚露、身體乳、護手霜、香皂到淡香精、香氛蠟燭,通通一次全方位呵護,更有限量首次誕生的義式聖誕掛式裝飾球,讓你從12月的第一天香到最後一天。

title: El futuro ha llegado: impacto exponencial del desarrollo tecnológico en la educación
creator: FERNANDO ÁLVAREZ B.
content: Fernando Álvarez Bogaert. A: la vicepresidenta y presidenta del Gabinete de Educación Raquel Peña y rectores universitarios (1/4) La educación virtual (en línea o e-learning) experimenta un crecimiento exponencial dados los avances tecnológicos en la última década y la creciente necesidad de acceso flexible al aprendizaje; transformado el modo tradicional como millones de personas han recibido docencia en el devenir del tiempo. La covid-19 aceleró este proceso, acentuando la importancia y el impacto global de lo virtual en el aprendizaje. Puede leer: Importancia de la energía solar en la actualidad e implementación en RD El crecimiento de esta modalidad es notable, según informe de Research and Markets, su mercado global se valorizó de aproximadamente 250 mil millones de dólares en el año 2020, a una esperada cantidad de 370 mil para el 2026, con tasa de crecimiento anual del 8,2% por factores como: Las instituciones educativas de todos los niveles han integrado esta modalidad educativa en sus programas, es el caso de la superior con plataformas como Coursera, edX, y Future Learn, permitiendo a millones de estudiantes desde cualquier parte de la geografía mundial, acceder a cursos de universidades de renombre como Harvard, Stanford y MIT ; además, las empresas la han adoptado para capacitar sus empleados, reconociendo su eficiencia y capacidad para llegar a audiencias globales. La transformación experimentada por la educación como resultado de la era...

title: “Eres haitiano con documento”, dijo el policía
creator: César Pérez
content: “Eres haitiano con documento”, le dijo el policía en labor de control migratorio a Franklin Dinol , trabajador y activista social, cuando al ser arrestarlo este le mostró sus documentos de identidad. Esa expresión del policía rebela lo que está en la conciencia de diversos sectores de la población dominicana, que una persona de origen haitiano nunca es ni podrá ser dominicano, algo reforzado por la más aberrante de las sentencias de tribunal alguno: la 168-13, de carácter retroactivo. Igualmente, la referida expresión evidencia ese racismo que desde siempre ha existido en la sociedad dominicana, acentuado con el ambiente de cruzada creado entorno a las deportaciones sin el debido proceso de los últimos años. En el cuartel policial, Dinol fue dejado en libertad , no sobre la base de un protocolo regulatorio de las deportaciones, sino por diligencia de activistas sociales y religiosos que acudieron a su auxilio. Junto a Dinol fue apresado el motoconchista de origen haitiano que lo llevaba al trabajo, este tenía sus papeles, obtenidos bajo el amparo de la Ley 169/14, pero estaban vencidos. Misma condición en que están los cerca de 200 mil desnacionalizados por la infame Sentencia. “Haitiano con documento”, esa expresión, como dijera el destacado intelectual perredeísta/perremeista Hugo Tolentino, en su panegírico a José Francisco Peña Gómez , “obliga a pensar en la infamia y la tragedia... en la infamia y la tragedia que desde su niñez se abatieron contra...

title: Unions face a moment of truth in Michigan in this year's presidential race
creator: By JOEY CAPPELLETTI and MATT BROWN - Associated Press

title: Unions face a moment of truth in Michigan in this year's presidential race
content: GRAND RAPIDS, Mich. (AP) — Vice President Kamala Harris rallies in Michigan’s union halls , standing alongside the state’s most powerful labor leader, while former President Donald Trump fires back from rural steel factories , urging middle-class workers to trust him as the true champion of their interests. As they compete for blue wall states with deep union roots, the presidential candidates are making their case to workers in starkly different terms . And nowhere is that contrast more significant than in Michigan, where both candidates are vying for workers’ support in a race that could mark a pivotal moment for organized labor. “The American dream was really born here in Michigan,” United Auto Workers President Shawn Fain told a crowd of several hundred while campaigning for Harris in Grand Rapids. Fain, who described Michigan as “sacred ground” for his union at the early October rally, warned that the dream was on “life support" and that unions like his were key to protecting it for American workers. Harris, who is planning to meet with union workers again in Michigan on Friday, hopes her message — amplified by supporters such as Fain — will resonate beyond the union families that once formed a rock-solid base for the Democratic Party. Her campaign has grown increasingly concerned about her standing with men in the blue wall states of Michigan, Wisconsin and Pennsylvania, where they are looking to union leaders to help mobilize voters in a political landscape that has...

title: The son of a South Carolina inmate urges the governor to save his father from execution
creator: By JEFFREY COLLINS - Associated Press
content: COLUMBIA, S.C. (AP) — Richard Moore never meant to kill anyone the night he robbed a South Carolina convenience store and the Black man was convicted by a jury with no African Americans, his son and lawyers say as they fight to save the inmate from execution next month. Moore went unarmed into a Spartanburg County store to rob it in 1999, took a gun from a clerk when it was pointed at him and fatally shot the clerk in the chest as the two struggled. The inmate's son, Lyndall Moore, said his father is now the only prisoner left on the state's death row convicted by a jury without any Black people. “He's a human being who made mistakes,” Moore added. “And this particular mistake led to the death of another human being. But his sentence is completely disproportionate to the actual crime.” South Carolina ended a 13-year pause on executions last month with the lethal injection of Freddie Owens . Moore is set to be executed Nov. 1. Moore's lawyers have urged the U.S. Supreme Court to stop the execution, saying a lower court should review whether it was fair that no African Americans were on the jury that considered Moore's fate in Spartanburg County, which was 20% Black in the 2000 U.S. Census. They also hope Moore will become the first South Carolina inmate whose death sentence is commuted to life without parole since executions in the U.S. resumed in 1976. Only South Carolina Gov. Henry McMaster can grant clemency . A former prosecutor, McMaster didn't grant it for Owens and has...

title: AP News in Brief at 12:04 a.m. EDT
creator: AP
content: Hezbollah vows to expand attacks in Israel after deadly strike in Lebanon's Christian heartland AITO, Lebanon (AP) — The day after a deadly Israeli airstrike in northern Lebanon – far from Hezbollah’s main area of influence – the militant group's acting leader said it would aim rockets into more areas of Israel. Naim Kassem said Hezbollah is focused on “hurting the enemy,” and he signaled it would ramp up attacks further south in Israel. He mentioned the cities of Tel Aviv and Haifa, which have already been targets of attacks. His comments in a pre-recorded, televised speech were delivered on the same day the United States said it sent a small team of troops to Israel to support an American-made missile-defense system. The Biden administration has also sent a warning to Israel: Increase the amount of humanitarian aid it allows into Gaza within the next 30 days or risk losing access to U.S. weapons funding. Hezbollah has fired an estimated 13,000 rockets into Israel over the past year in support of Hamas’ war with Israel in Gaza. Tens of thousands of northern Israelis have been displaced from their homes, and Israel has said its escalating war with Hezbollah is aimed at stopping those rockets so families can return home. US warns Israel to boost humanitarian aid into Gaza or risk losing weapons funding WASHINGTON (AP) — The Biden administration has warned Israel that it must increase the amount of humanitarian aid it is allowing into Gaza within the next 30 days or it could...

title: These 5 Pennsylvania congressional races could determine House control
creator: By MARC LEVY - Associated Press
content: HARRISBURG, Pa. (AP) — With the U.S. House narrowly divided, contests for Pennsylvania's seats will be critical to control of the chamber in this year's election, even as the state also plays a big role in determining control of the White House and Senate . The magic number of pickups is four for Democrats to take control of the House, magnifying the stakes of each House race. In Pennsylvania, the parties began the year viewing five races as competitive, as Democrats defend their 9-8 advantage in the state's 17-seat delegation. Adding to the stakes is the fact that Pennsylvania is home to one of the “Biden 16” — the 16 House districts nationally that President Joe Biden won in 2020 but are represented by Republicans. On the opposite side, Pennsylvania is also home to one of the eight districts that former President Donald Trump won but are represented by Democrats. Five of those Democrats are running for reelection. Federal Election Commission filings show the candidates and outside groups have poured more than $60 million into the races, with the total expected to climb significantly until polls close on Nov. 5. For Republicans, there may be room to flip districts: Two incumbent Democrats won by fewer than 2.5 percentage points in 2022. Here is a look at the five key races: Four-term Republican U.S. Rep. Brian Fitzpatrick in Bucks County, just north of Philadelphia, is a top target again for Democrats: He is one of the Biden 16. But Fitzpatrick, a mild-mannered former FBI...

title: Zelenskyy to unveil 'victory plan' to Ukrainian lawmakers after presenting it to Western allies
creator: By SAMYA KULLAB - Associated Press
content: KYIV, Ukraine (AP) — Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy was set to at least partially unveil a plan to win the war against Russia to his country's Parliament on Wednesday after weeks of dropping hints about the blueprint to lukewarm Western allies, including U.S. President Joe Biden. The plan — comprising military, political, diplomatic and economic elements — is considered by many as Ukraine’s last resort to strengthen its hand in any future cease-fire negotiations with Russia . Thus far, however, no country has publicly endorsed it or commented on its feasibility. Zelenskyy is keen to get the “victory plan” in place before a new U.S. president is sworn in next year, though Ukrainian officials say neither presidential candidate will necessarily improve Kyiv’s standing in the war. Zelenskyy’s presentation to Parliament, announced on Monday by presidential adviser Serhii Leshchenko, comes during a bleak moment in Ukraine . The country’s military is suffering losses along the eastern front as Russian forces inch closer to a strategically significant victory near the crucial logistics hub of Pokrovsk. At every turn, Kyiv is outnumbered by Moscow : The country is struggling to replenish ranks with an unpopular mobilization drive; its ammunition stocks are limited; and Russia’s superiority in the skies is wreaking havoc for Ukrainian defensive lines. It’s not clear how much of his victory plan Zelenskyy will reveal on Wednesday; Leshchenko indicated that it would be fully...

title: 00887之亂!金管會認「完美小風暴」 櫃買2周內提查核報告
content: ▲圖為示意圖(《ETtoday新聞雲》資料照)。 記者巫彩蓮/台北報導 連結陸港股海外ETF、永豐中國科技50大(00887)引爆史上最大漲幅與溢價紀錄,金管會副主委陳彥良今(16)日在立法院財委會上指出,這是「首次遇到的完美小風暴」。櫃買中心也表示,已做專案查核,預計一周~兩周內提交報告。 立委郭國文質詢00887是否有人為炒作,陳彥良表示「還不敢肯定」。他解釋,00887規模僅18億元,當時是因為大陸釋出政策利多激勵陸股,但因10月1日~7日陸股休市,沒有交易,但我們仍在交易中,使投資人追買所致。 [廣告]請繼續往下閱讀... 永豐投信向金管會承諾本周內消弭溢價至3%以內,00887今日都在平盤之下表現,盤中最低報8.6元,跌幅5.81%,近12點成交量4萬3918張。 郭國文說,9日00887單日淨值縮水32.94%,相較追蹤同一陸股指數的「中証科技50」同一天淨值跌幅僅5.1%,偏離度高達27.84個百分點,這合理嗎?櫃買中心董事長簡立忠上台接受質詢時則說,已請永豐投信把相關資料在三天內提供給櫃買,預計一周到兩周內提出查核報告。

title: Middle Tennessee beats winless Kennesaw State 14-5 in the first meeting between the programs
content: MURFREESBORO, Tenn. (AP) — Nicholas Vattiato passed for 199 yards, Omari Kelly returned a punt 61 yards for a touchdown and Middle Tennessee beat winless Kennesaw State 14-5 on Tuesday night in the first meeting between the programs. Kelly scooped up a punted ball that bounced 10 yards in front of him and stiff-armed a tackler near the 20-yard line before racing into the end zone for a 14-2 lead with 5:09 left in the third quarter. Jekail Middlebrook rushed for the other touchdown when he capped an eight-play, 80-yard drive on a 1-yard plunge. Kelly also had six catches for 77 yards for Middle Tennessee (2-5, 1-2 Conference USA). Holden Willis had a team-high eight grabs for 92 yards. Marvae Myers made a diving interception in the end zone with 12:06 left in the second quarter to preserve Middle Tennessee's 7-2 lead. De’Arre McDonald also intercepted a pass at the end of the first half. Khalib Johnson was just 5 of 17 for 52 yards with two interceptions for Kennesaw State (0-6, 0-2), which entered ranked last in Conference USA with a scoring average of 14.6 points per game. Donelius Jackson recorded the first safety in Kennesaw State history when he broke free up the middle to stuff Middlebrook early in the first quarter. content: MURFREESBORO, Tenn. (AP) — Nicholas Vattiato passed for 199 yards, Omari Kelly returned a punt 61 yards for a touchdown and Middle Tennessee beat winless Kennesaw State 14-5 on Tuesday night in the first meeting between the programs. Kelly scooped up a punted ball that bounced 10 yards in front of him and stiff-armed a tackler near the 20-yard line before racing into the end zone for a 14-2 lead with 5:09 left in the third quarter. Jekail Middlebrook rushed for the other touchdown when he capped an eight-play, 80-yard drive on a 1-yard plunge. Kelly also had six catches for 77 yards for Middle Tennessee (1-6, 0-3 Conference USA). Holden Willis had a team-high eight grabs for 92 yards. Marvae Myers made a diving interception in the end zone with 12:06 left in the second quarter to preserve Middle Tennessee's 7-2 lead. De’Arre McDonald also intercepted a pass at the end of the first half. Khalib Johnson was just 5 of 17 for 52 yards with two interceptions for Kennesaw State (0-6, 0-2), which entered ranked last in Conference USA with a scoring average of 14.6 points per game. Donelius Jackson recorded the first safety in Kennesaw State history when he broke free up the middle to stuff Middlebrook early in the first quarter. Get poll alerts and updates on the AP Top 25 throughout the season. Sign up here . title: ++ Raid a sud di Beirut, fumo nero tra gli edifici ++
content: (ANSA-AFP) - BEIRUT, 16 OTT - Un raid ha colpito il sud diBeirut, secondo quanto mostra l'Afptv. L'attacco è arrivato pocomeno di un'ora dopo l'ordine di evacuazione ai residenti emessodall'Idf. Il fumo nero si è alzato tra i palazzi di Haret Hreik. (ANSA-AFP). title: Shift toward EVs, particularly in China, could disrupt global oil market, energy report says
creator: By TAIWO ADEBAYO - Associated Press
content: An increasing shift toward electric vehicles globally, especially in China, is poised to disrupt the global oil market, according to a report released Wednesday by the International Energy Agency. In recent years, China has accounted for most of the growth in oil demand and planet-heating emissions, but electric vehicles now make up 40% of new sales of cars there, and 20% of sales globally, putting major oil and gas producers “in a bind.” The IEA World Energy Outlook 2024 outlines a future where EV adoption continues to gain momentum, potentially displacing up to 6 million barrels per day of oil demand by 2030. The agency said based on current trends and policies and the availability of materials, EV will reach 50% of global car sales in 2030. China already accounts for half the world’s electric cars on the road. By 2030, it's projected that 70% of new car sales in China will be electric. With its massive additions of new wind and solar power, China is aligned with its target for addressing climate change, seeing emissions peak and begin to decline by the end of the decade. The clean energy expansion, however, is happening alongside a rise in demand for electricity, including power produced by burning coal, according to the IEA. "This has meant that even as we saw record growth in clean energy installations and additions, emissions kept increasing,” said Lauri Myllyvirta, lead analyst at the think tank Centre for Research on Energy and Clean Air. title: In the heartland of Mexico's Sinaloa cartel, the old ways have changed and violence rages
creator: By MARK STEVENSON - Associated Press
content: MEXICO CITY (AP) — Cellphone chats have become death sentences in the continuing, bloody factional war inside Mexico's Sinaloa drug cartel. Cartel gunmen stop youths on the street or in their cars and demand their phones. If they find a contact who’s a member of a rival faction, a chat with a wrong word or a photo with the wrong person, the phone owner is dead. Then, they’ll go after everyone on that person's contact list, forming a potential chain of kidnapping, torture and death. That has left residents of Culiacan, the capital of Sinaloa state, afraid to even leave home at night, much less visit towns a few miles away where many have weekend retreats. “You can’t go five minutes out of the city, ... not even in daylight,” said Ismael Bojórquez, a veteran journalist in Culiacan. “Why? Because the narcos have set up roadblocks and they stop you and search through your cellphone.” And it’s not just your own chats: If a person is traveling in a car with others, one bad contact or chat can get the whole group kidnapped. That’s what happened to the son of a local news photographer. The 20-year-old was stopped with two other youths and something was found on one of their phones; all three disappeared. Calls were made and the photographer’s son was finally released, but the other two were never seen again. Residents of Culiacan had long been accustomed to a day or two of violence once in a while. The presence of the Sinaloa cartel is woven into everyday life there, and people...

title: Today in History: October 16, Cuban Missile Crisis begins
creator: By The Associated Press
content: Today is Wednesday, Oct. 16, the 290th day of 2024. There are 76 days left in the year. Today in history: On Oct. 16, 1962, the Cuban Missile Crisis began as President John F. Kennedy was informed that reconnaissance photographs had revealed the presence of nuclear missile bases in Cuba. Also on this date: In 1758, American lexicographer Noah Webster was born in Hartford, Connecticut. In 1793, during the French Revolution, Marie Antoinette, the queen of France, was beheaded. In 1859, radical abolitionist John Brown led a raid on the U.S. arsenal at Harpers Ferry in what was then a part of western Virginia. (Ten of Brown’s men were killed and five escaped. Brown and six followers were captured; all were executed.) In 1934, Chinese Communists, under siege by the Nationalists, began their “long march” lasting a year from southeastern to northwestern China. In 1964, China set off its first atomic bomb, codenamed “596,” on the Lop Nur Test Ground. In 1968, American athletes Tommie Smith and John Carlos sparked controversy at the Mexico City Olympics by giving “Black power” salutes during a victory ceremony after they had won gold and bronze medals in the 200-meter race. In 1978, the College of Cardinals of the Roman Catholic Church chose Cardinal Karol Wojtyla (voy-TEE’-wah) to be the new pope; he took the name John Paul II. In 1984, Anglican Bishop Desmond Tutu was named winner of the Nobel Peace Prize for his decades of non-violent struggle for racial equality in South Africa....

title: 台9線草埔隧道休旅車自撞 40歲駕駛恍神釀禍...頭部受創送醫
content: 記者陳崑福/屏東報導 蔡姓男子15日下午駕駛自小客車行經南迴公路台9線草埔隧道內時,一時恍神,自撞內側護欄後再撞及外側護欄,導致頭部受傷送醫治療,事故後,封閉北上車道,開放南下車道通行,半小時後交通恢復正常。 ▲台9線草埔隧道內交通事故 。(圖/記者陳崑福翻攝) 枋寮警分局於15日14時32分許接獲報案,於獅子鄉台9線436公里處(草埔隧道內)有交通事故發生,經警方到場處理,係40歲蔡姓男子駕駛自小客車,沿台9線北上(往台東)行駛自撞內側護欄後在撞擊外側護欄肇事,駕駛頭部撕裂傷,無生命危險,由119救護車送往枋寮醫院。 車禍事故發生後北上車道封閉外車道,內側車道正常通行,枋寮警分局員警及安碩交控中心消防人員於現場協助疏導警戒,車禍於16時8分排除,恢復正常通行。

title: 台灣少子化!2023年「貓狗登記數」多出新生兒近10萬
content: ▲台灣毛小孩登記飼養量超過每年新生兒。(示意圖/ETtoday資料照) 文/中央社 台灣少子化嚴重,台灣動物保護行政監督聯盟今天(16日)表示,台灣毛小孩登記飼養量已超過每年新生兒,2023年貓狗登記數量更高出新生兒近10萬。 台灣動物保護行政監督聯盟秘書長何宗勳今天指出,農業部電話抽樣調查,台灣家犬、家貓飼養數量高達279萬隻,其中家犬148萬637隻、家貓131萬1449隻,全國飼養寵物戶數28.3%,平均每3戶至4戶就有1戶飼養寵物。 [廣告]請繼續往下閱讀... 何宗勳表示,台灣2020下半年出現黃金交叉,全台犬貓隻數首度超過15歲以下孩童數;2021年1月至9月新生兒11萬2000人,同期間貓、狗認養登記數量卻達15萬8000隻。 2023年數據顯示,台灣全年累計犬隻登記9萬4544隻,貓兒13萬7652隻,合計23萬2196隻,遠高於同年新生兒13萬5571人,多出近10萬。如今,飼養非犬貓種類寵物戶數更逐年上升。 何宗勳說,近年來動保議題成為顯學,台灣毛小孩登記飼養量超過每年新生兒,從中央到地方首長多關注動保議題。但台灣都會化嚴重,高樓林立,人口密度高,想要清楚住戶生態及飼養寵物情況相當不易。

title: 障害者支援施設の送迎バスの中で女性に性的暴行か、運転手の男を逮捕
content: 障害者支援施設の送迎バスの中で、女性に性的暴行を加えた疑いで、71歳の運転手の男が逮捕された。 本橋進容疑者(71)は、東京・小金井市の障害者支援施設を利用する女性(20代)に、送迎バスの中で、性的暴行を加えた疑いが持たれている。 本橋容疑者は送迎バスの運転手で、女性を自宅に送り届ける途中、2人きりになった隙を狙い犯行に及び、女性に「誰にも言わないでね」などと、口止めのメッセージを送っていた。 本橋容疑者は「わいせつなことはしていません」と容疑を否認しているが、女性は複数回被害にあったと話していて、警視庁が余罪を調べている。 (「Live News days」10月16日放送より)

title: Community Calendar for Oct. 16 and beyond
content: EDITOR’S NOTE : Send your Community Calendar items to Executive Editor David Kennard at dkennard@robesonian.com. Windows of Time – Art Exhibition, noon to 3 p.m. Oct. 16 : “Windows of Time,” an exhibition for two talented North Carolina artists, Nila Chamberlain and Sandy Stratil, is on display at the Red Springs ArtSpace. For the duration of the exhibition through Oct. 20, our hours are noon to 3 p.m. on Wednesday and 2-4 p.m. on Sunday, also by appointment. text 910-240-2887. Robeson Community College classes begin Oct.16 : Second Mini Semester (Withdrawal Date, Dec. 9). Color Theory Class – RAG, 2-4 p.m. Oct. 17 : Join Kay Bradsher for a fun afternoon class! Learn to paint more vibrantly, construct more harmonious compositions, and use color theory to design and decorate your home! You will experiment with what you learn and create your own one-of-a-kind artwork to take home. Contact the Robeson Art Guild for registration information at 910-816-7481. Bark at the Moon, 6-8 p.m. Oct. 17 : Bark at the Moon is a fundraising event to benefit the Robeson County Humane Society budget, used to care for local animals and the pet adoption process. Supplies are always welcome. Visiting Authors & Social – RCPL, 6:30-8 p.m. Oct. 17 : The Robeson County Public Library is hosting the first of the 2024-2025 Visiting Authors Series featuring Martha Dunlop, author of “The Starfolk Trilogy and Wild Shadow.” The event is open to the public. Meet the author and enjoy light refreshments....

title: 台灣山葉確定導入「新3缸仿賽重機」 時間落在明年第2季!
content: ▲台灣山葉宣布將導入YZF-R9新3缸仿賽重機,時間落在2025年第2季。(圖/翻攝自Yamaha,以下同) 記者林鼎智/綜合報導 在YZF-R9全新3缸仿賽重機海外發表後 (報導請點此) ,台灣山葉(Yamaha)也正式宣告將在明年第2季導入,為國內車迷帶來全新Supersport性能體驗。不過,台灣山葉目前並沒有公布YZF-R9的相關售價、以及導入台灣市場後的動力數據。 新YZF-R9融入MotoGP賽事的頂尖技術,車頭具有優化空氣力學的定風翼,可提供更多高速下壓力,同時也具有KYB SDF全可調前倒叉、後KYB全可調多連桿後避震,並且換上Brembo Stylema輻射對4活塞卡鉗等,結合5吋TFT儀表、豐富電控系統,可說是相當有產品競爭力。 ▲YZF-R9搭載CP3 3缸引擎,具有119匹馬力/9.5公斤米扭力,共有3款車色選擇,不論是電控系統、配備也相當有競爭力。 動力上,YZF-R9搭載CP3 890c.c.三缸引擎,具有119匹馬力/9.5公斤米扭力輸出,帶來高扭力、靈活操控感受,新YZF-R9共有Team Yamaha Blue藍、Matte Raven Black黑與Intensity White/Redline三款車色選擇,後續就待台灣山葉公布預售消息。

title: Des agents de libération conditionnelle inquiets pour la sécurité du public
content: Un syndicat représentant les agents de libération conditionnelle craint que des coupes budgétaires de plus de 100 M$ à Service correctionnel Canada mettent en danger le public en limitant la capacité de ses membres à retrouver les délinquants qui ne respectent pas leurs conditions de libération. Le Syndicat des employés de la Sécurité et de la Justice (SESJ) dénonce particulièrement la suppression de trois postes à Montréal et à Québec. Il s’agit d’un spécialiste des recherches de délinquants illégalement en liberté et de deux agents de renseignement sécuritaire. Le premier est en contact avec les policiers, mais aussi avec des institutions financières et des compagnies de téléphonie, par exemple, pour déceler des transactions pouvant lui permettre de retrouver une personne en fuite. Les autres font un travail similaire, mais se retrouvent moins sur le terrain. Efficace «Si après une semaine l’agent de libération conditionnelle n’avait pas retrouvé le délinquant qui a raté un rendez-vous, on demandait au spécialiste. Il était en contact constant avec les policiers et faisait de la recherche à temps plein. Il avait beaucoup de succès», explique Annie Blanchette, vice-présidente régionale du SECJ. «Le Service correctionnel du Canada va couper 45 M$ en 2024-2025 et 69,5 M$ en 2025-2026. La charge de travail de ces gens va tomber sur les agents, qui n’ont pas le temps. Si on ne peut faire les bonnes vérifications ainsi que les surveillances,...

title: Victime de vol et séquestration en 2011: un bijoutier se désole de voir que son assaillant ne saisisse pas loccasion de se réhabiliter
content: Un joaillier de Lévis dont la vie a été chamboulée pendant des années à la suite d’un vol et d’une séquestration dont il a été victime en 2011 se désole de voir aujourd’hui que celui qui lui a fait vivre l’horreur n’a jamais su se réhabiliter pour mener une vie honnête. Pierre Mercier, propriétaire de la Joaillerie Mercier du secteur de Saint-Jean-Chrysostome, n’oubliera jamais la nuit du 8 au 9 septembre 2011. Jonathan Dontigny, qui venait de passer sept années derrière les barreaux, a vite retrouvé ses mauvaises habitudes en ciblant la joaillerie de M. Mercier pour y commettre son prochain crime. À ce moment, il était en liberté illégale. Le bijoutier a passé la nuit entière séquestré dans son commerce, alors que Dontigny et ses complices dévalisaient sa bijouterie pour plus de 85 000$. Des documents des libérations conditionnelles obtenus par Le Journal montrent que le voleur, aujourd’hui âgé de 38 ans, multiplie les allers-retours en prison depuis 2005, notamment pour divers dossiers où la violence a souvent été employée. Lors de chacune de ses libérations d’office, Dontigny n’a jamais saisi la chance de se remettre dans le droit chemin. Sa dernière libération d’office remonte au 27 décembre 2023. Dès le mois suivant, il a échoué à respecter ses conditions en se retrouvant en liberté illégale. «Il ne s’est pas dompté, ç’a bien l’air», laisse tomber le bijoutier dont le commerce se trouve toujours sur l’avenue Taniata, dans le...

title: Berva Joan (Moon) Miller
content: October 6, 1935—October 9, 2024 RUPERT — Berva Joan (Moon) Miller, an 89-year-old resident of Rupert, passed away Wednesday, October 9, 2024, at Minidoka Memorial Hospital in Rupert. Joan was born October 6, 1935, in Rupert, Idaho, the daughter of William Ray and Clara Almeda (Whitaker) Moon. She received her education in Rupert and graduated from Rupert High School in 1954. She married Eugene Wesley Miller on April 2, 1954, in Rupert. Their marriage was solemnized in the Idaho Falls Idaho Temple on April 2, 1957. During her high school years she worked at King’s Department Store. Joan was fortunate to be a stay at home mother until her children were in school. She then started her career in banking with Idaho First National Bank, which later became WestOne Bank, and she retired from US Bank after many years of service. Joan enjoyed knitting, crocheting, making beautiful greeting cards, and ceramics. As an active member of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints, Joan served as a Primary President, Relief Society President, Secretary in the stake Sunday School Presidency, and was a faithful member of the ward choir. She is survived by her husband, Wesley Miller of Rupert; four children, Beverly (Gary) Garner and Candy (Wendell) Jones both of Rupert, Sandy (Stanley) Baker of Burley, and Wesley Dee Miller (Thomas Sedlak) of Fresno, California; 12 grandchildren; 24 great-grandchildren; and a sister-in-law, Dorothy Moon of Buhl. She was preceded in death by her parents;...

title: Walmart s’engage à offrir du poulet élevé au Québec en magasin
content: Après le porc et le bœuf, la multinationale américaine Walmart promet de s’approvisionner majoritairement de poulet élevé au Québec dans sa soixantaine de magasins chez nous, a appris Le Journal . «Walmart Canada est fière de travailler avec environ 2000 fournisseurs canadiens, dont plus de 480 sont du Québec. Nos succursales de la province offrent maintenant du poulet, du porc et du bœuf du Québec», a indiqué Cyrille Ballereau, vice-président, Walmart Canada, dans une déclaration obtenue par Le Journal . «Cette gamme de produits répond aux attentes des consommateurs quand ils achètent du poulet: qu’il soit élevé localement, refroidi à l’air et vendu dans une barquette recyclable», a déclaré Daniel Rivest, vice-président principal des ventes chez Olymel. Plus de 3,5 G$ de produits Il y a plus de 61 supercentres de Walmart au Québec. Plus de 12 000 personnes y travaillent. L’an dernier, l’entreprise américaine a acheté pour environ 3,5 milliards dollars de produits québécois. En décembre 2023, Le Journal rapportait que Vaudreuil-Dorion n’aurait pas son centre de traitement de commandes de 100 M$ parce que Walmart avait choisi moderniser huit magasins en sol québécois à la place. Il y a quatre ans, une enquête réclamée par l’Union des producteurs agricoles (UPA) sur Walmart était tombée à l’eau , car ses producteurs avaient trop peur de témoigner à visière levée contre l’imposition de «frais exorbitants» imposés par le géant. Walmart...

title: Johnny Eugene 'Gene' Potter
content: September 8, 1937—October 5, 2024 RUPERT — Johnny Eugene Potter, better known as “Gene,” passed away on October 5, 2024, at his home in Rupert. Gene was born September 8, 1937, at 1024 E. Street in Rupert, ID. Gene was the youngest son born to Adelbert LeRoy and Eva (Hugentobler) Potter. He grew up in Rupert at the home where he was born. He learned to work and play while making lifelong friends. Gene attended schools in Rupert and was among the first graduating students from Minico High School. Gene started work for O.K. Rubber Welders at the age of 15. After 40 years working in the tire industry, he took employment with the Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints for the next 11 years before retirement. Gene’s love story began when he married Beverly June Kidd in Burley on February 20, 1959, his father’s birthday. Their union was solemnized in the Salt Lake Temple, and for 65 years, they journeyed through life as a devoted, loving couple. Gene and June were blessed with two children, Eugene Bryan and Cheryl Lyn. He was a member of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints and served faithfully in many callings. Gene was an avid hunter in his younger years and loved to fish. He spent many hours with his boat water skiing and teaching others. Forty years of snowmobiling was added to his interests. Later, he was riding his A.T.V. with family and friends. Gene’s love for adventure was evident in his travels and his favorite trips were the summers spent in Alaska. He...

title: École Bedford: c’est la faute à personne
content: À en écouter plusieurs, la situation qui existe à l’école primaire Bedford depuis 2016 est la «faute à personne». Le centre de services scolaire de Montréal (CSSDM), l’Alliance des professeurs de Montréal... aucun d’entre eux n’est responsable de quoi que ce soit dans cette affaire. Au-delà de l’importance ou non de l’appartenance communautaire et/ou religieuse des enseignants concernés, c’est cette absence de responsabilisation qui est consternante. Problématiques L’organisation et le fonctionnement du CSSDM sont clairement visés par ce rapport quand on prend la peine de le lire. On remarque que ce centre de services: En bref, celui-ci aura laissé, pendant plus de sept pénibles années, un groupe d’enseignants archaïques – et défendus par leur syndicat – prendre le leadership pédagogique de cette école. Quant à ses interventions pour redresser cette situation, quand il y en a eu, elles se sont avérées pour le moins inefficaces. Pas étonnant qu’on apprenne que trois autres écoles de ce même centre de services scolaire font dorénavant l’objet d’une enquête comme celle de Bedford. C’est à se demander si le CSSDM sait comment gérer des situations difficiles. Au nom d’une autonomie professionnelle mal comprise, on aura aussi permis à des enseignants d’exercer des pratiques désuètes ou carrément nuisibles. Or, comme on l’écrit si bien dans ce rapport remis au ministre Drainville: «L’autonomie professionnelle des enseignants ne peut pas s’exercer au...

title: 沖繩必吃拉麵!曾在九州拉麵票選擊敗一蘭 滿滿蔥芝麻融入豚骨湯
content: 撰文攝影/ 台南好FOOD遊 、整理/實習記者黃是瑀 創立於2007年的「暖暮拉麵」幾乎是台灣人來沖繩必吃的拉麵,大概是因為曾經在九州拉麵票選中擊敗過一蘭拉麵獲得第一名,挾帶著光環,每次去吃都要大排長龍,尤其是國際通附近的那霸牧志店,少說也要排上一個小時才能吃到餐點。 不過目前「暖暮拉麵」在沖繩共有6家分店,除了那霸牧志店需要排比較久外,據說其他的分店比較沒有那麼多人排隊,如果大家不想浪費太多時間排隊,也可以查一下另外5家分店的分布位置,安排在行程中前往用餐即可減少排隊時間。 ►更多吃喝玩樂大小事,快追隨旅遊雲官方Instagram 沖繩必吃拉麵暖暮拉麵 我們這次來用餐的也是「暖暮拉麵」那霸牧志店,真的不誇張,排隊進到店裡就是整整一小時,排到後來都下雨了,但為了朝聖第一名的拉麵就是要甘願。 可客製化麵軟硬度湯濃郁度跟辣度 「暖暮拉麵」設有投幣點餐機,選好餐再付款,可接受現金或電子支付,硬幣只能投10円以上的。點好餐後記得取出退幣與單據,然後在單據上圈出你想要的麵的硬度共5種硬度、湯的濃度、要不要蔥花、辣度共4種,再交給服務人員即可。 蔥芝麻拉麵 加蛋ネギごまラーメン +替玉 點了蔥芝麻拉麵,裡面有兩片叉燒肉和大量的芝麻,蔥的用量是拉麵的兩倍,加入的是用壓榨白芝麻油而不使用豬油,芝麻香氣很濃郁,適合給擔心膽固醇的客人。 叉燒拉麵 チャーシューメン 原味拉麵加了6片叉燒肉,給喜歡吃叉燒的人大滿足,暖暮的辣算是還滿能提味的,麵量也不少,還有對我這種蔥花控來說,我也喜歡他們的蔥花給得特別多,暖暮的湯頭跟一蘭一樣都是豚骨的,我覺得是好吃但屬於中規中矩,不算是讓人太驚豔的那種,叉燒肉肥瘦剛好,偏薄片是比較可惜一點,厚一點我會更喜歡。 一口餃 煎得酥脆,皮薄餡多的餃子,表現算不錯,搭配拉麵一起吃真是完美。 ▲桌上都備有辣醃菜可讓客人自行添加取用。 暖暮拉麵評價 初訪吃過 「暖暮拉麵」覺得蔥芝麻拉麵口味還不錯,整體中規中矩,煎餃也是我在日本吃過眾多的煎餃中算是有排名前幾名好吃的,有來沖繩還是會來吃一下,但應該會考慮找不用排隊的分店為主,畢竟有插過旗了。 暖暮拉麵 那霸牧志店 地址:沖縄県那覇市牧志2-16-10 營業時間:11:00-02:00 (年中無休) 台南好Food遊 我是Lydia,台南鄉下小孩,從旅行中愛上台灣,喜歡分享生活瑣事與旅行的美好,從台南在地美食出發,立志要踏遍全台灣走遍全世界。現有經營: 粉絲團 、 部落格 、 Instagram 【你可能想看】 ► 看圖先痛風!台南最狂海鮮粥有「龍蝦雪蟹、60公分澎湖砲管」 ► 通通吃到飽!部隊鍋199元、韓式燒肉399元 正宗醬醃生螃蟹超搶手 ► BLACKPINK、五月天都來過!高雄洲際酒店住一晚 自助早餐超精緻

title: Les maïs soufflés Bad Monkey en difficultés financières: «On reste optimistes. On va passer au travers»
content: Alors que des documents de cour récents révèlent que le fabricant québécois de maïs soufflé Bad Monkey pourrait faire faillite en raison de dettes, ses cofondateurs assurent au contraire au Journal être capables de ressortir de ces vents de face plus forts qu’avant. «On a des millions de ventes. On reste optimistes. On va passer au travers», résument au Journal Fabio et Joseph Zeppilli, cofondateurs de Bad Monkey, présent dans cinq pays. «C’est juste une restructuration. C’est sûr que la faillite est toujours un peu une prochaine étape, mais on n’est pas rendu là», soufflent-ils. Le premier actionnaire (non majoritaire) de Bad Monkey est Fondaction, selon le Registre des entreprises du Québec. Le deuxième est Champlain Bad Monkey Investissement s.e.c. et le troisième est Champlain Bad Monkey International s.e.c. Parmi les bénéficiaires ultimes se trouve Pierre Simard, directeur de la Corporation Financière Champlain, qui était actionnaire de contrôle de Louis Garneau Sports. Nouveaux actionnaires D’après Richter, séquestre au dossier, Bad Monkey a 1,3 million de dollars de créances garanties à la Banque TD et près de 7,3 millions de dollars de créances non garanties. «L’entreprise, tel qu’elle est opérée aujourd’hui n’est pas viable, mais il est possible qu’un autre joueur dans le domaine au Québec ait déjà l’infrastructure pour la repartir de façon plus rentable», analyse Olivier Benchaya, partenaire chez Richter au dossier. «Il est fort...

title: 毛孩常見疾病「寄生蟲」列前茅!醫:預防重於治療 寵愛食剋3D一次搞定
content: ▲獸醫師提醒寄生蟲感染「預防重於治療」,選擇台灣唯一美國FDA核准內外驅蟲口服錠,能一次預防三大類體內外寄生蟲。(採訪撰稿/記者胡至欣;攝影剪輯/記者劉亮亨) 記者胡至欣/採訪報導 家有毛小孩,飼主最擔心的除了分離焦慮,還有健康問題,尤其台灣氣候潮濕悶熱,正是寄生蟲喜愛的環境。在《 Social Lab社群實驗室 》公布的「網友熱議TOP12貓狗常見疾病」網路聲量排行中,寄生蟲感染與犬心絲蟲便名列前茅,想帶毛孩出門跑跳增加活力,又該如何預防看不見的健康威脅?讓專業醫師來解答。 ▲環境中看不見的寄生蟲是毛孩健康的潛在威脅。(圖/記者劉亮亨攝;以下同) 好悠動物醫院獸醫師丁文廷提醒,「台灣比較常見的寄生蟲,最主要就是跳蚤、壁蝨,再來蚊子也是會傳染一些體內寄生蟲的疾病,像是心絲蟲,都是要吃很久的口服藥,然後打一些特殊針劑,甚至住院治療,費用上面一定比較貴,再來的話,這些疾病結束之後,即使痊癒了,也可能對狗狗的身體都造成一些危害。」 ▲好悠動物醫院獸醫師丁文廷。 丁醫師強調「預防重於治療」,除了保持環境衛生,還得定期為狗狗進行驅蟲處理,從日常保健做起,確保犬隻遠離寄生蟲困擾。他也進一步指出,「我自己個人的狗狗是使用『寵愛食剋3D』,它是台灣唯一美國FDA核准的內外驅蟲口服錠,能100%預防心絲蟲,而且可以一次殺滅三大類體內外寄生蟲,使用上適口性也好,再來它很方便,每個月定期服用,就能達到效果。」 ▲「寵愛食剋3D」是台灣唯一美國FDA核准的內外驅蟲口服錠。 隨著毛孩在生活中扮演的角色日益重要,寵物保健與照護產品也持續優化,「寵愛食剋3D」定義了狗狗驅蟲新標準,每月一顆,一次搞定心肺(心絲蟲、肺蟲)、體外(跳蚤、壁蝨)、腸道(蛔蟲、鉤蟲)三大類寄生蟲,已是不少飼主的心頭好。 ▲▼「寵愛食剋3D」含有天然豬肝成分,適口性好。 飼主Amber表示,「因為狗狗很喜歡在外面跑跳,然後很愛在草地上翻滾,就會擔心寄生蟲的危害,我的朋友推薦寵愛3D,說是台灣唯一被核准有效果可以100%驅蟲,因為它含有豬肝成分,所以適口性很高,狗狗也非常願意吃,每個月吃也很方便,帶狗狗出門就可以盡情地玩耍,不用擔心。」 ▲1.25公斤~60公斤狗狗都能找到對應體重的合適產品。 定期檢查、服藥預防,才能給予寵物全面保護。即日起加入 臺灣碩騰LINE好友 ,到指定合作獸醫院,可享「寵愛食剋3D」第2盒半價優惠,滿8週齡以上、1.25公斤~60公斤狗狗都能找到對應體重的合適產品,幫你守護毛孩健康,遠離蟲蟲危機。

title: Appel à la réinstauration de la gratuité du stationnement au Complexe sportif Claude-Robillard
content: Madame la Mairesse, Mesdames et Messieurs les élus, Nous, soussignés, représentants des nombreuses associations sportives, clubs sportifs et organismes d’activités physiques de loisirs ayant leurs activités au Complexe sportif Claude-Robillard, tenons à exprimer notre profonde inquiétude et notre désaccord face à la récente décision de rendre payant le stationnement au sein de ce complexe sportif. Cette décision a des répercussions considérables sur l'ensemble de la communauté sportive montréalaise et remet en question l'accessibilité à un équipement sportif d'une importance capitale. Cette décision est d’autant plus regrettable qu’elle va à l’encontre du rapport et des recommandations pour un accès inclusif aux plateaux sportifs . Ce rapport a été déposé le 13 mai dernier par la Commission sur la culture, le patrimoine et les sports qui est présidée par M. Jocelyn Pauzé, conseiller de la Ville. Par ailleurs, nous tenons à souligner que notre pétition réclamant le retour de la gratuité du stationnement a recueilli plus de 5800 signatures. Ce nombre considérable témoigne de l'ampleur du mécontentement suscité par cette décision. Malgré cette mobilisation citoyenne et les promesses faites par M me Sophie Mauzerolle, porte-parole de la Ville, lors du conseil municipal de septembre 2024, nous constatons un manque de volonté de la part de l'administration à dialoguer et à trouver des solutions. Cette situation est d'autant plus...

Bridgepoint to Reinvest in Kyriba, Alongside New Minority Investor, General Atlantic
content: SAN DIEGO--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Oct 16, 2024-- Bridgepoint, one of the world's leading quoted private asset growth investors, and Kyriba, the global leader in liquidity performance, today announced that Bridgepoint will reinvest in Kyriba following a period of record growth for the business and will remain the majority shareholder. In addition, Bridgepoint and Kyriba will welcome a new minority investor, General Atlantic, a leading global growth investor. The transaction, which values the company at over $3 billion, is expected to close in Q4 2024, and financial terms beyond this were not disclosed. Following five years of support from Bridgepoint, Kyriba has grown substantially in this period, tripling its software revenue and evolving from a pioneer in treasury management to the leader in liquidity performance solutions. Today, Kyriba serves close to 3,000 customers in 170 countries. With a significant investment from its latest flagship fund, Bridgepoint will support Kyriba’s next phase of growth and mission to provide best-in-class liquidity performance solutions to companies around the world looking to navigate increasing volatility. Partnering with General Atlantic brings additional deep technological and operational expertise to the business. Kyriba, Bridgepoint and General Atlantic share a collective ambition to reinforce Kyriba’s market leadership, while delivering gold standard cloud treasury and liquidity performance solutions for CFOs, treasurers, and finance teams,...

title: Kucherov gets 4th goal of the season, Lightning beat Canucks 4-1 in Milton-delayed home opener
creator: By MARK DIDTLER - Associated Press
content: TAMPA, Fla. (AP) — Nikita Kucherov scored his fourth goal of the season, and the Tampa Bay Lightning defeated the Vancouver Canucks in their hurricane-delayed home opener on Tuesday night. Kucherov had a hat trick the last time the Lightning took the ice, and he was the one to open the scoring against the Canucks off of a feed from Darren Raddysh 3:55 into the game. The Lightning were scheduled to open the home season Saturday night against the Carolina Hurricanes, but the game was postponed due to the aftermath of Hurricane Milton. Brayden Point, Anthony Cirelli and Brandon Hagel each had a goal and an assist in the win, while Andrei Vasilevskiy made 26 saves in net. Conor Garland scored Vancouver's only goal on a power play in the third period. Arturs Silovs stopped 24 shots for the Canucks. Canucks: Vancouver is 0-1-2 after winning 50 games last season. The offense has eight goals, including five in the first period, through three games. Lightning: After spending most of last week in Raleigh, North Carolina, due to Hurricane Milton, some players and staff, including coach Jon Cooper, are staying in hotels due to ongoing power outages. The off-ice situation has not affected their performance in games. After Tampa Bay failed to make it 3-0 during a late second-period power play, Vasilevskiy made strong saves on Tyler Myers and Brock Boeser. Garland also put a shot off the post during that stretch. Kucherov had a point on all of the Lightning's first five goals to start the...

title: أسعار الذهب اليوم وعيار 21 الآن بعد أن تجاوز 3600 جنيه ببداية تعاملات الأربعاء 16 أكتوبر 2024
要台鐵節電遭質疑「車站不開冷氣」 陳世凱:服務品質不能降低
content: ▲交通部長陳世凱。(圖/記者李姿慧攝) 記者李姿慧/台北報導 新版電價今(16日)上路,用電大戶台鐵電費支出一年將增4.56億元,讓凍漲29年的票價壓力大,交通部長陳世凱日前喊話台鐵先節電,立委質詢質疑此言造成基層困擾,難道是要台鐵車站月台不開冷氣?陳世凱表示,他並未指用電少開,而是透過新車和冷氣汰換節電,車站該開的冷氣一定要開,服務品質不能降低。 立委廖先翔今在立法院交通委員會質詢時表示,台鐵電費增加是不是會影響票價,部長說先從節電做起,造成基層很大困擾,台鐵行車和車站用電佔了8成多,列車行駛如何節電?月台難道要不開冷氣嗎?台鐵列車開車、月台冷氣就要用這麼多電。 [廣告]請繼續往下閱讀... 交通部長陳世凱表示,台鐵113年做好節能補助,今年工作場所用電量較去年同期減少1.5%,他也拜託經濟部針對台鐵用電專案輔導節電,並申請減免優惠。 陳世凱強調,他所謂的節電是指可以透過車站更換節電冷氣,或換新車後,達到更節能效益,並非是要用電少開,電價有沒有漲,節電一定要做,車站該開的冷氣一定要開,服務品質不能降低。

title: Familiares y trabajadores afectados en accidente de Deer Park demandan a Pemex
creator: internet@elsiglodetorreon.com.mx (EL UNIVERSAL)
content: La familia de Jason Scott, uno de los trabajadores fallecidos en el derrame químico de la semana pasada en las instalaciones de Pemex, en Deer Park, Texas, presentó una demanda por muerte por negligencia contra la empresa y sus socios. La demanda, presentada en nombre de la familia de Scott, alega que "sufrió lesiones fatales y soportó dolor y sufrimiento al sucumbir al gas tóxico" y afirma que su "esposa, hijos y padres han sido privados irreparablemente de su amado familiar como resultado de la conducta de los acusados" , reportó Telemundo. El abogado Kurt Arnold, que representa a la familia de Scott, declaró que la firma también representa a otros 11 trabajadores lesionados durante el incidente. Otro grupo de trabajadores entabló una demanda por un millón de dólares en contra de la empresa alegando daños físicos, emocionales y económicos. La empresa respondió en un comunicado que están conscientes del litigio y que están profundamente tristes por la muerte de los trabajadores, por lo que no han tenido tiempo de revisarla.

title: Solar Power: Suns eclipse Panthers in WCC showdown
creator: By MIKE THOMAS Herald-Whig Sports Editor mthomas@whig.com

title: No. 21 SMU hits the road for ACC game vs. Stanford
content: Having successfully dealt with two of their new rivals to the east, SMU turns its attention west when the No. 21 Mustangs make their first Atlantic Coast Conference trip to Stanford on Saturday night. Riding high off a bye following a 34-27 win at then-No. 22 Louisville, SMU (5-1, 2-0 ACC) will face an opponent it hasn't seen since the 1935 Rose Bowl, a game Stanford won 7-0 to hand the Mustangs their only loss that season. Despite the defeat, SMU was declared the 1935 national champion by two prominent ranking methods -- a mathematical points formula known as the Dickinson System and a strength-of-schedule calculation known as the Houlgate System. The Mustangs haven't won a widely recognized national title since. The Associated Press poll made its debut in 1936. Looking ahead to a remaining schedule that doesn't include either ACC frontrunners Clemson or Miami and features just one other currently ranked team (No. 20 Pittsburgh), SMU will be seeking its fourth straight win against a Stanford squad that has lost three in a row. The Mustangs head west as a ranked team. They moved into the rankings after the Louisville victory prior to having a bye. They moved up four spots in Sunday's poll. Being ranked is something coach Rhett Lashlee has cautioned his guys has its positives and negatives. "We've had a week to hear about our press, our ranking and all that. And that's great -- our guys have earned it," Lashlee said. "But if we don't stay present, we don't focus on the task...

title: Middle East latest: Hezbollah's acting leader says the group is focused on hurting Israel
creator: By The Associated Press
content: Hezbollah’s acting leader declared Tuesday that the Lebanese militant group is focused on “hurting the enemy” by targeting Haifa and other parts of Israel, including Tel Aviv. Sheikh Naim Kassem, Hezbollah’s deputy chief, vowed in a televised speech to “defeat our enemies and drive them out of our lands.” It was his third appearance since Hezbollah leader Hassan Nasrallah was killed in an Israeli airstrike in a southern suburb of Beirut. The United Nations human rights office meanwhile called for an independent probe into an Israeli airstrike that hit an apartment block in Aito in northern Lebanon, killing at least 22 people, including 12 women and two children. Israeli strikes continued in the southern Gaza Strip , killing at least 15 people overnight, including six children and two women, Palestinian medical officials said Tuesday. In northern Gaza, where Israel has been waging an air and ground campaign in Jabaliya for more than a week, residents said families were still trapped in their homes and shelters. It’s been more than a year since Hamas-led militants blew holes in Israel’s security fence and stormed in, killing some 1,200 people, mostly civilians, and abducting another 250. Israel’s offensive in Gaza has killed over 42,000 Palestinians, according to local health authorities, who do not say how many were fighters but say women and children make up more than half of the fatalities. The war has destroyed large areas of Gaza and displaced about 90% of its population...
